original: Giving to others what I may need in the future is not always the best choice. I've lost the §YCharitable§! trait.
translation: 把我将来可能用得上的东西送给别人并不总是最好的选择。我失去了§Y慷慨§!特质。

original: Sometimes sharing what I have with others feels good. I've lost the §YGreedy§! trait.
translation: 与人分享是一种快乐。我失去了§Y贪婪§!特质。

original: Books are precious, as the knowledge of things past and new are written in their pages. This beacon of knowledge will have capacity to store thousands of books, and will have reading facilities.
translation: 书籍是宝贵的，有关古往今来事物的知识写在它们的字里行间。这座知识的宝库将具备储存数以千计的书籍的能力，还配有配套的阅读设备。
萨摩斯的阿斯克勒庇阿得斯
萨拉米斯的赫尔谟德鲁斯

original: [Root.GetBookThemeCap] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], that was thought to be lost forever, but was found and acquired by [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] for his Great Library.
translation: 颇负盛名的[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookThemeCap]，一度被认为永远失传，由[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]寻获并陈列于其大图书馆内。

original: Initially thought to be [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], it is now considered a clever forgery.
translation: 最初以为是[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle]，如今被认定是一件伪造技术高明的赝品。

original: An ancient knight's armor found on a mysterious tomb.
translation: 在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的护甲。

original: An ancient knight's sword found on a mysterious tomb.
translation: 在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的佩剑。

original: An ancient scepter, adorned with many emeralds, which was found on an old king's tomb.
translation: 在一位古代君王的陵墓中发现的古老权杖，上面装饰着许多绿宝石。

original: Mostly a waste of good metal, the blacksmith who made this suit of armor was probably drunk when they did so.
translation: 基本上是对优良金属的浪费，打造它的铁匠当时很可能喝醉了。

original: A two-handed powerful but heavy sword, that can only be properly handled by a strong warrior.
translation: 一把强力但是沉重的双手剑，只有强壮的战士才能得当地使用它。

original: The §YTraining Academy§! in my §YAmphitheater§! possesses many well-trained young warriors. Maybe the best one out of them will make a good military commander.
translation: 我§Y圆形剧场§!里的§Y锻炼学院§!拥有许多训练有素的年轻勇士。或许他们当中最出色的那位可以成为一名优秀的军事指挥官。

original: Has not recruited an Academy Hero in the last 5 years.
translation: 在过去的5年内没有招募过学院英雄。

original: A gladiator-trained warrior appears at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
translation: 一名受过训练的角斗士出现在§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!的宫廷里。

original: This character trained as a Gladiator in the arena.
translation: 这个角色被训练成为了一名角斗士。

original: The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the [the_temple.GetName], they place [From.GetHerHim] on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] on top of the temple, and slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.
translation: 祭司们拽着尖叫的[From.GetTitledFirstName]到了[the_temple.GetName]，将[From.GetHerHim]放在神庙顶部的[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]，以仪式用匕首切开了[From.GetHerHim]的胸膛。随后，在集会人群的欢呼声中，他们扯出了[From.GetHerHis]仍在跳动的心脏。

original: The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the top of the [the_temple.GetName] and they keep [From.GetHerHim] steady on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] that stands there while I slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. I then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.
translation: 祭司们拽着尖叫的[From.GetTitledFirstName]到了[the_temple.GetName]，将[From.GetHerHim]固定在矗立于顶部的[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]上，我以仪式用匕首切开了[From.GetHerHim]的胸膛。随后，在集会人群的欢呼声中，我扯出了[From.GetHerHis]仍在跳动的心脏。

original: This option is available because you have the §Y[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]§!
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]§!

original: A visitor to my court told me that in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName] he heard rumors that a rich merchant had acquired an unheard of [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName].
translation: 一位到访我宫廷的访客告诉我说，他在位于[book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName]的[book_province.GetName]听闻一名富商获得了[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]，此书前所未闻。

original: I received a letter from someone in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName], claiming that he has in his possession a copy of [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. But that work was unknown until now!
translation: 我收到来自位于[book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName]的[book_province.GetName]某人的书信，声称他收藏有一份颇负盛名的[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著[Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle]的副本。但此著作一直不为人知直到今日！

original: I shall ask [possible_emissary1.GetFirstName] to go and try to acquire the book!
translation: 我应该让[possible_emissary1.GetFirstName]去那并且试着拿到那本书！

original: It is interesting news, but right now I have more pressing matters to attend to.
translation: 这是个有趣的消息，但现在我有更要紧的事情处理。

original: I actually do not care about missing books. The collection I have is enough.
translation: 我一点儿都不在乎失踪的书籍。我的收藏品已经够多了。

original: You will no longer be bothered with news about lost books.
translation: 你再也不会因失落之书的消息而烦恼了。

original: My courtier [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] returned today with the sad news that [emissary.GetHeShe] could not obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], and is even not sure it really exists. [emissary.GetFirstName] returned the money that remained after the Journey expenses.
translation: 我的廷臣[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]今天带着不幸的消息回来了。[emissary.GetHeShe]没有得到著名的[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]的著作[Root.GetBookTheme]，甚至无法确定它是否真的存在。[emissary.GetFirstName]退还了路上花剩下的钱。

original: My Lord [Root.GetTitle]\n I [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick], your humble servant, am still trying to obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. \n Unfortunately I have run out of funds. Would your grace be so generous as to send me some extra money, I am almost sure to be able to find and acquire the book you seek.
translation: 我主[Root.GetTitle]\n 我，[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]，您谦卑的仆人，仍在努力获取[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]。\n 可惜我已花完了资金。大人您可否慷慨解囊给我额外的经费，我差不多确定能寻获您想要的书籍了。

original: I will send the money. It will be worth it!
translation: 我会寄钱过去。这是值得的！

original: No, it is too expensive. Let [emissary.GetHerHim] return empty handed.
translation: 不，这太贵了。让[emissary.GetHerHim]两手空空的回来吧。

original: I just got news that [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is staying in the court of [emissary_current_host.GetTitledNameWithNick] spending my money and with no intent of returning! And the [Root.GetBookTheme] by [Root.GetAuthorName] is nowhere to be found.
translation: 我刚得到消息，[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]滞留在[emissary_current_host.GetTitledNameWithNick]的宫廷里挥霍我的钱财，无意归来！而且[Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]也无处可寻。

original: Oh no! I must be more careful choosing who to send next time.
translation: 噢不！我下次必须更谨慎地选择派谁去。

original: Maybe somebody will take care of the traitor?
translation: 也许有人能处理一下这个叛徒？

original: The traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is no longer alive. And nobody will be able to trace [emissary.GetHerHis] death to me.
translation: 那个叛徒[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]死了。不会有人把[emissary.GetHerHis]死和我联系在一起。

original: Curses! The attempt on the life of the traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] failed, and my involvement was discovered.
translation: 该死！谋杀叛徒[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]的尝试失败了，而且我的参与被发现了。

original: Nobody betrays me and gets away with it.
translation: 没有人在背叛我以后还能活下来的。

original: Maybe it was not such a good idea.

[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] has returned with the [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName]! Maybe I should invite some learned scholars to discuss this precious finding?
translation: [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]带着被认为是由[Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]回来了！或许我应该邀请几位饱读诗书的学者来讨论这本珍贵的书籍？

original: I will read the book and see by myself.
translation: 我要独自一人阅读这些书。

original: Let us send letters and invite some scholars
Just announce the discovery and store the book in my library
translation: 仅仅公布发现并把书储存在我的图书馆里

original: You gain the [the_book.GetName] as an artifact.
The Lost Book is a Fake!

A scholar working in my library, [the_whistleblower.GetTitledNameWithNick] is saying that my precious [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] is falsification!\n  I can imprison [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim], but on the other hand a courtier who speaks the truth might be a good person to have around me.
translation: 在我的图书馆「[the_whistleblower.GetTitledNameWithNick]」中工作的一名学者称我持有的，据信是由[Root.GetAuthorName]编写的珍贵的《[Root.GetBookTheme]》是一部伪书！\n我自然可以逮捕[the_whistleblower.GetHerHim]，不过从另一个角度考虑，我身边可能正少一位敢说真话的廷臣。
谁给[the_whistleblower.GetSheHe]的胆子？把那个白痴[the_whistleblower.GetManWoman]抓起来！

original: I will reward [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim] for speaking the truth!
This book seems to be a forgery!
After a careful reading of the [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] I believe it is a forgery. Nevertheless, the contents of the book are actually not bad.
translation: 仔细阅读被认为是由[Root.GetAuthorName]所做的[Root.GetBookTheme]之后，我断定它是一册伪书。虽然话是这么说，但这本书的内容其实不赖。

original: I actually learned something from the book.
translation: 事实上我从这本书里学到了一些东西。

original: Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. The book was considered as a lost masterpiece and my court is famous now as a center of culture, scholarly debate and knowledge.
translation: 许多学者都接受了我的邀请，他们聚在我这里进行了几天研讨，他们不仅探讨了[Root.GetAuthorName]的书，也涉及其他的古代知识。这部书籍被认为是一部失落的杰作，我的宫廷现在因为成了文化、学术辩论和知识的中心而著称。

original: Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. Unfortunately, after much discussion, the book was considered as a forgery, but my court is famous now as a center for scholarly debate, culture and knowledge.
translation: 许多学者都接受了我的邀请，他们聚在我这里进行了几天研讨，他们不仅探讨了[Root.GetAuthorName]的书，也涉及其他的古代知识。很不幸，经过了充分的讨论，这部书籍被认为是一部伪作，不过我的宫廷现在还是因为成了文化、学术辩论和知识的中心而著称。

original: A center for culture. That sounds good.
Good. And maybe next time I will actually obtain a masterpiece.
translation: 结果还行，说不定下次我就真的能获得一部杰作了。

original: A book containing the lost [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName] was acquired and on this date a great meeting of scholars confirmed its authenticity. In those times, [wonder_province.GetName] was known as a place of culture, visited by scholars from afar.
translation: 获得了颇负盛名的[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]，并且当日学者们的大会确认了其真实性。在那个时代里，[wonder_province.GetName]是知名的文化盛地，来自远方的学者也会慕名而来。

original: While digging the ground during the building of [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName], the workers came across some kind of door for what seems to be a closed chamber.
translation: 建筑[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]的工人在挖掘过程中偶然发现了像似门的结构，看起来似乎有一间密室。

original: The construction overseer on my [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName] just told me a worker fell in a hole while digging and found some bones. It seems to be some kind of old grave.
translation: 我[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]工地上的监工刚刚报告我在挖掘过程中，一个工人跌进一个洞里，发现了一些骨头。看起来那是某种古老的坟墓。

original: Let us spend some time and gold to investigate.
translation: 让我们花点时间和金钱去研究一下

original: Maybe there are some old valuables inside.\n
translation: 说不定里面有什么值钱的东西。\n

original: Just ignore and continue the work.
I do not want to be bothered again with such petty details!
translation: 别再让我为这种细枝末节的东西操心！

original: You will no longer be bothered with news about findings during construction of the great works.\n
translation: 你不会再受到与奇观建筑过程中的发现有关的消息打扰。\n

original: It is probably an ancient tomb. Explore with caution.
translation: 可能是座古墓。小心探索。

original: This option is available because you have either a high Learning, or the traits Erudite or Architect.\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有高学识，或者有博学或建筑师特质。\n

original: While the workers were trying to dig there was a cave-in and several men were buried in the debris. And now we need to clear everything.
translation: 工人们试图挖掘的时候发生了塌方，几个人被埋进了废墟里。现在我们得把所有东西清理干净。

original: After a few days digging, all that was found were old bones and broken vases. A waste of time and gold.
translation: 挖了几天之后，找到的只有古人的遗骨与破碎的瓶瓶罐罐。我们的时间和金钱全部白费了。

original: After some digging, a big stone appeared, blocking an entrance. When the workers removed the stone, an old tomb was discovered, with a small quantity of silver and gold objects in it.
translation: 经过一些挖掘，一块阻挡着入口的大石头出现了。当工人们移开石头时，他们发现了一座古墓，里面有少量的黄白之物。

original: The workers found a number of small connected underground chambers under the [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName] construction site with old burial remains, and a fair amount of silver and gold objects!
translation: 工人们在[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]施工现场地下找到了几间相连的墓室，里面有些被埋葬的古人的残余，还有数目可观的黄白之物！

original: The workers dug their way into a large chamber where some old lord was put to rest. In there they found some gold objects and a [found_artifact.GetName].
translation: 工人们一路掘进一座巨大的墓室，里面安息着某位古代的领主。他们在里面找到了一些黄金制品，还有[found_artifact.GetName]。

original: You gain the [found_artifact.GetName] as an artifact.\n
Not giving some compensation to the widows and orphans of the dead workers might give us problems in the future.\n
translation: 如果不去给身故工人留下的孤寡些许赔偿的话，我们将来有可能面临麻烦。\n

original: The workers might be upset if they receive nothing.\n
translation: 如果工人们什么都得不到的话。他们会很沮丧。\n

original: Let us give to the workers a share of the gold.
I will keep both the valuables and the [found_artifact.GetName].
Let us distribute the gold to the workers as a reward.
translation: 把黄金发给工人当作报酬吧！

original: We shall give some gold to the families of the victims.
translation: 我们会给遇难者的家人一些钱。

original: The smiths in our own [the_armory.GetName] are capable enough!
translation: 我们自己[the_armory.GetName]里的工匠已经足够了！

original: This option is available because you have a §Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§! with an §Y[the_armory.GetName]§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有包括§Y[the_armory.GetName]§!的§Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§!。

original: The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was an armor you wanted right?" he adds.
translation: 城堡里的铁匠献给你一个脏兮兮的旧盒子，看上去他们更习惯于锤制马鞍和头盔，而不是造王室想要的东西。「当当当当！」他紧张地说道，「这就是您想要的盔甲吧？」

original: My master [GetWeaponArmorSmith] came to see me in the throne room. [smith.GetSheHeCap] gestured towards [smith.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [smith.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
translation: 我的[GetWeaponArmorSmith]大师来到宝座室晋见。[smith.GetSheHeCap]示意指向[smith.GetHerHis]好几位助手，都拿着[smith.GetHerHis]工作成果的样品。「我的[Root.GetTitle]心中是否已有想法？」

original: I want a heavy two-handed sword.
This sword can only be handled by a strong warrior, but is sure to impress friend and foe alike.
translation: 这把剑只能被一个强大的战士所使用，但它肯定会给朋友和敌人留下深刻的印象。

original: Having a conversation with §Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! in an appropriate place might convince [Root.GetHerHim] to be more supportive.
translation: 与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个合适的地点进行对话也许会使[Root.GetHerHim]更加支持我。

original: You will take §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! near the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! in your §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a talk with [target_character.GetHerHim] about the importance of cooperation.
translation: 你将与§Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在接近你§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!的地方会面，跟[target_character.GetHerHim]好好讲一讲合作的重要性。

original: Has NOT attempted to intimidate a character in the past 2 years[From.GetScaryCD]
translation: 过去的2年里没有威胁一名角色[From.GetScaryCD]

original: - you can try to intimidate a character again on: §Y[This.used_scary_upgrade_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!

I invited [target_character.GetBestName] for a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, while [target_character.GetBestName] grew more and more uncomfortable, before I leaned in to say...
translation: 今天我邀请[target_character.GetBestName]一同散步，并表示我有些东西要给[target_character.GetHerHim]看。最终我们在我的[target_upgrade.GetName]附近停下。我在这里安静地等了几分钟，在我凑近低语之前，[target_character.GetBestName]显得愈发不适……

original: I invited [target_character.GetBestName] on a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, but [target_character.GetSheHe] seemed to be enjoying the view. Then I said...
translation: 今天我邀请[target_character.GetBestName]一同散步，并表示我有些东西要给[target_character.GetHerHim]看。最终我们在我的[target_upgrade.GetName]附近停下。我在这里安静地等了几分钟，而[target_character.GetSheHe]对于此处景色显得十分享受。随后我说道……

original: ...'I hope you understand how important this favor is'.
translation: ……「希望你能记住，你欠我的这个人情有多『大』。」

original: the attempt to coerce a favor fails
translation: 通过威胁获取人情的企图失败

original: ...'What do you think of my toy?'.
translation: ……「你感觉我的『小玩具』怎么样啊？」
……「这个血淋淋的东西也吓到我了！」

original: [target_character.GetBestName] just laughed at me! A lot! How dare [target_character.GetSheHe]?! I even shouted at a servant this morning, when her giggling woke me up. I... I can still hear [target_character.GetTitledFirstName] laughing, mocking me in my dreams.
translation: [target_character.GetBestName]刚刚嘲笑我了！还很过分！[target_character.GetSheHe]怎么敢？！为此我甚至呵斥了一位在早上咯咯笑着把我吵醒了的侍女。我……我甚至在梦中还能听到[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]大笑着，嘲讽着我。

original: I should not have brought him to the [target_upgrade.GetName].
Meeting §Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! in a secluded place might be interesting.
translation: 与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个隐蔽的地方会面会很有趣。

original: You will invite §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! to meet you in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a private conversation with [target_character.GetHerHim].
translation: 你将邀请§Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!来到§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!，你和[target_character.GetHerHim]将在那里展开一场私密谈话。

original: Has NOT invited a character for a private talk in the past §Y6§! months[From.GetSecludedCD]
translation: 过去的§Y6§!个月内没有邀请一名角色进行私人谈话[From.GetSecludedCD]

original: [From.GetBestName] invited me to meet [From.GetHerHim] in the [target_upgrade.GetName] of the [target_wonder.GetName].
I will politely invent an excuse and refuse.
[target_character.GetBestName] accepted my invitation to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some time talking...
translation: [target_character.GetBestName]接受了我在[target_wonder.GetName]的[target_upgrade.GetName]会面的邀请，经过一番交谈……

original: ... We will know each other a little better.
You do not know how §Y[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]§! will react if you try to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but you might become lovers.
translation: 你不清楚如果你试着去亲吻§Y[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]§!的话[target_character.GetHerHim]会如何回应，说不定你们就会成为恋人。

original: ... I get my dagger out and try to stab [target_character.GetHerHim] in the heart.
translation: ……我抽出匕首，试图直刺[target_character.GetHerHim]的心脏！

original: This option is available because you have either a high §YIntrigue§! or related traits\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你有高超的§Y阴谋§!技能或其他相关的特质\n

original: The outcome of this will depend on your §YPersonal Combat Skill§!, as §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! might resist your murder attempt...
translation: 结果取决于你的§Y个人实战能力§!，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!也许会反抗你的谋杀企图……

original: [target_character.GetBestName] [target_character.GetPoliteRefuse] declined my invitation me to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName].
translation: [target_character.GetBestName][target_character.GetPoliteRefuse]拒绝了我发出的邀请我去[target_wonder.GetName]的[target_upgrade.GetName]的隐蔽处会面的提议。

original: I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. We are having a pleasant conversation.
translation: 我前往[target_wonder.GetName]的[target_upgrade.GetName]，我与[From.GetBestName]在隐蔽处会面。我们进行了愉快的交谈。
令人愉快，但不是很实际。

original: I think [From.GetBestName] was impressed with our conversation.
translation: 我感觉[From.GetBestName]对我们的谈话印象颇深。

original: I'm meeting [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [target_wonder.Location.GetName], in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName]. After the usual pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] pauses. "[Root.GetFirstName], there is something I have wanted to do for a long time", [From.GetSheHe] says, [From.GetHerHis] eyes wandering.
translation: 我前往[target_wonder.Location.GetName]，与[From.GetTitledFirstName]在僻静的[target_upgrade.GetName]会面。在一番日常的客套后，[From.GetSheHe]顿了顿。「[Root.GetFirstName]，有件事情我想做有很长一段时间了，」[From.GetSheHe]接着说道，[From.GetHerHis]神色游移着。

original: I get my dagger out and try to stab [From.GetHerHim] in the heart!
translation: 我抽出匕首，试图直刺[From.GetHerHim]的心脏！

original: I tried to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but [target_character.GetSheHe] recoiled from me with disgust and fear on [target_character.GetHerHis] face.
translation: 我试图亲吻[target_character.GetHerHim]，但[target_character.GetSheHe]厌恶地退缩了，在[target_character.GetHerHis]的脸上只有畏惧。

original: I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] pulls a dagger from under [From.GetHerHis] clothes and tries to stab me!
translation: 我前往[target_wonder.GetName]的[target_upgrade.GetName]，我与[From.GetBestName]在隐蔽处会面。一番玩笑后，[From.GetSheHe]从[From.GetHerHis]衣服下掏出一把匕首并试图刺向我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] blinks in surprise as I step closer to [From.GetHerHim]. But when I move to caress [From.GetHerHis] cheek, I catch the glint of steel in the [From.GetManWoman]'s hand! "You.. You were going to use that on ME?!"
translation: 当我走近[From.GetTitledFirstName]的时候，[From.GetHerHim]的眼中闪烁着惊讶。但当我用手抚摸[From.GetHerHis]脸颊时，我瞥见这个[From.GetManWoman]的手中有一丝精钢的寒光！「你......你要把那个用在我身上？！」

original: You'll have to catch me first!
you managing to escape, but wounded.
translation: 你成功逃离了，但受了伤。

original: you being killed while trying to escape.
I won't go down without a fight!
It was a very bad idea to go meet to meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName]. I barely escaped with my life. My hands still tremble when I think of it.
translation: 与[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[target_upgrade.GetName]的隐蔽处会面实在是糟透了。我好不容易才死里逃生。每当我回想时我的手仍然止不住颤抖。

original: Fortunately [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s dagger missed my heart, and I managed to escape with my life. The physician says I will survive. Let us see.
translation: 幸运的是，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的匕首偏离了我的心脏，我成功逃生了。我的医生说我会活下来的。我们走着瞧。

original: This is not what was supposed to happen...!

As I see the blood slowly leaving my body, forming a pool on the ground, and the hands of death reaching for me, I now think of all the things I could have done if I knew this day would end like this.
translation: 当我看着血从我的身体中慢慢流淌，在地上形成血泊，死亡之手已向我伸出，我在想，如果早知道今天会发生这样的事我应该做些什么。

original: As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss my mark. Then [From.GetSheHe] just runs away. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.
translation: 正当我的匕首刺向[From.GetHerHis]心脏，[From.GetTitledFirstName]举起手臂，让我扑了空。接着[From.GetSheHe]立刻逃之夭夭。现在我不得不去面对这一后果。

original: As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss the mark. I wound [From.GetHerHim], but [From.GetSheHe] manages to run away, leaving a trail of blood behind. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.
translation: 正当我的匕首刺向[From.GetHerHis]心脏，[From.GetTitledFirstName]举起手臂，让我扑了空。我弄伤了[From.GetHerHim]，但[From.GetSheHe]成功逃跑了，只留下了一滩血迹。现在我不得不面对这一后果了。

original: Before [murderer.GetSheHe] can run away, I bury my dagger in [murderer.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [murderer.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [murderer.GetHerHim]. [murderer.GetHerHisCap] face is frozen in a look of betrayal.
translation: 在[murderer.GetSheHe]试图逃跑前，我把匕首插入了[murderer.GetHerHis]胸膛！我让[murderer.GetTitledFirstName]躺在地上，血泊环绕了[murderer.GetHerHim]的周身。因为背叛，[murderer.GetHerHisCap]的表情变得僵硬。

original: We fight each other, but in the end, I prevail and bury my dagger in [murderer.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [murderer.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [murderer.GetHerHim].
translation: 我们互相搏斗，但最终我占了上风，我把匕首插入了[murderer.GetHerHis]胸膛！我让[murderer.GetTitledFirstName]躺在地上，血泊环绕了[murderer.GetHerHim]的周身。

original: After many years of tenaciously establishing new borders for our Empire, the time has come to officially declare ourselves the Tsardom of Russia. What a glorious day!
translation: 在为我们的帝国坚持开疆拓土这么多年之后，是时候正式宣告我们是俄罗斯沙皇国了。多么荣耀的一天！

original: After many years of preparation, [From.GetBestName] has chosen to declare complete sovereignty over [From.GetHerHis] vast territories by founding the Tsardom of Russia.
translation: 经过多年的准备，[From.GetBestName]选择了通过建立俄罗斯沙皇国来宣告对[From.GetSheHe]广袤领土的完全统治权。

original: Holding the Empire of Rus is not enough – some are starting to think that 'the Empire of Russia' has a better ring to it...
translation: 建立罗斯帝国仍然不够——有些人开始觉得俄罗斯帝国听起来更好……

original: Lowers the requirements for upgrading Tribal Holdings to Castles
translation: 降低从部落地产升级到城堡的要求

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady], something has been found in the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage]" a scribe catches up with me. "An old book, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]?" When I join [Root.GetHerHim] for a closer inspection, I have to agree with the assessment. "Old indeed", I sneeze. "We should have someone care for it", the scribe suggests.
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，在[inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage]找到了一些东西。」一位书吏赶上了我，「一本旧书，来自[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]？」当我凑近[Root.GetHerHim]仔细地检查了一下，我不得不认同这看法。「确实是旧，」我打了个喷嚏，「我们需要有人保管它，」书吏建议道。

original: Upon inspecting the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage], my guards have found [inherited_artifact.GetName], an old weapon. "It must have belonged to [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", they inform me. "Shame it's not in better shape", they mutter.
translation: 在检查了[inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage]之后，我的卫兵们发现了一把古老的武器，[inherited_artifact.GetName]。「这想必属于[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]」，他们告诉我。「可惜它的状态并不好……」他们小声嘟哝。

original: I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName], a piece of armor, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "I am not sure it's in any wearable condition, my [Root.GetLordLady]" the quartermaster informs me, as I trace the pattern on it with one hand.
translation: 我新近继承了[inherited_artifact.GetName]，一套来自[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]的盔甲。「我不确定这件盔甲真的能穿，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」我的手拂过盔甲表面的花纹时，军需官说道。

original: I have recently inherited an item from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "It has probably seen better days, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", the guard tells me, before continuing: "We are sorry to bother you with this, we just weren't sure whether to get rid of it or not".
translation: 我新近从[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]继承了一个物件。「它过去也许很不错，[Root.GetMasterMistress]，」卫兵告诉我，「我们很抱歉让你为此操心，我们只是不确定是否该扔掉它。」

original: I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName] from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It is not in good shape.
translation: 我新近从[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]继承了[inherited_artifact.GetName]。它的状态并不好。

original: The [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage] currently houses a valuable item I inherited from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It might need someone to look after it though.
translation: 现下[inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage]里存放着一件我自[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]处继承来的珍贵物品。它可能需要人手来照看。

original: "What is it?" I ask the guards. "You have inherited this... [inherited_artifact.GetName]", one of them explains. "From [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", [Root.GetSheHe] continues. "If you want to keep it, we'll store it for you, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. It might need some maintenance though."
translation: 「那是什么？」我向守卫询问道。「您从[previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]那里继承了一件宝物，」他们中的一个人解释道。「就是这件[inherited_artifact.GetName]，」[Root.GetSheHe]继续说道，「[Root.GetMasterMistress]，您要是想留下这东西，我们就会替您保存它。毕竟它可能需要一些保养。」

original: I suppose it could be worth something, one day...
translation: 我想它总有一天会派上用场……

original: For sentimental reasons, I could have someone look it over.
translation: 介于感情上的因素，我可以找个人再来查看一下。

original: Maintenance is to be expected, I guess.
translation: 我想这东西确实需要保养。

original: We cannot put a price on heirlooms like this. Spare no expense!
translation: 传家宝的价值不能用钱来衡量。该花的钱一分也不能省！
看起来它对我来说没什么用。

original: We cannot afford to maintain all the old junk thrown our way.
translation: 我们可没闲钱「保养」所有挡路的旧货、垃圾！

original: A testament to the piety of its builder, the church stretches to the sky.
translation: 这座教堂直冲云霄，是对它建造者虔诚的证明。

original: This building is a testament to the piousness of its builder.
translation: 这座建筑物是对它建造者虔诚的证明。

original: Anyone setting foot in the building will be reminded of the value of a religious community.
translation: 这座建筑物会提醒所有走进它的人宗教社区有多么大的价值。

original: The site of the temple is rumored to be the holiest ground in the realm.
translation: 据传这座寺庙的选址是国内最神圣的土地。

original: A ruler is immortalized in this grand statue.
translation: 统治者通过这座宏伟的雕像而永垂不朽

original: The fortress is a safe-haven, a home away from home for many warriors.
translation: 要塞是做安全的避风港，对于许多战士们来说，这是他们的第二个家。

original: Partially carved from the very rock it sits on, only its owner knows exactly how far these tunnels sprawl.
translation: 这个地下城是在其所在岩石的部分上凿出的，只有地下城的主人才能准确知道这些隧洞挖得有多深，铺得有多远。

original: A mega-project, this is a construction of massive city walls.
translation: 建造巨型城墙的大工程

original: Heavily trafficked, the magnificent Harbor is bringing both trade and tourism to the area.
translation: 这个宏伟的港口海运繁忙，为该地区带来了贸易和游客。

original: A tall and visible landmark, the building lends a helping hand to sailors, guiding their ships into port at night.
translation: 一个高大醒目的地标，这个建筑对水手多有帮助，引导他们的船只在夜间入港。

original: The epitome of high culture, the amphitheater is a unique attraction in the realm.
translation: 作为高等文化的缩影，圆形剧场在这片领地有着独特的吸引力。

original: A regal symbol of the prestigious lineage of its builder, this palace is one of its kind.
translation: 建造者显赫家世的尊贵象征，这座宫殿也属于此类。

original: The garden is a marvel of both science and beauty.
translation: 花园是科学与美学双重意义上的奇迹。

original: A high seat of learning, famous throughout the realm.
A simple tomb is not enough for some rulers.
translation: 用一方简简单单的坟墓来纪念某些统治者显然是不够的。

original: "Build it taller!", was apparently the last words of its architect.
translation: 「再建高点！」这显然是其建筑师最后的遗言。

original: Huge standing rocks are placed in a grand circle, with an opening towards the east, where the sun rises.
translation: 巨型立石排列成一个庞大的圆阵，圆阵有一个开口朝向太阳升起的东方

original: The strangely shaped pyramids have always been there.
translation: 奇形怪状的金字塔一直以来就矗立在那里。

original: The amphitheater has seen many uses throughout the centuries, including gladiatorial and animal fights, and later even serving as market stalls for city merchants.
translation: 圆形剧场在数个世纪间被用作多种用途，不仅作为角斗士表演和斗兽表演的场所，在晚期甚至被当做商人摆摊的集市使用。

original: This great church, the Shrine of the Holy Wisdom of God, is one of the world's largest buildings. It was finished in 562 AD[FromFrom.GetHagiaSophiaUse].
translation: 这座大教堂，上帝神圣智慧的神殿，是世界上最大的建筑物之一，它于公元562年完工[FromFrom.GetHagiaSophiaUse]。

original: Some think the rocks were placed by gods. Others say it's pagan superstition, but refuse to go near them.
translation: 一些人觉得这些巨石是由诸神置于此处的，另一些人却说这是原始宗教的迷信，拒绝靠近。
哈利卡那索斯的摩索拉斯陵墓

original: A giant above-ground tomb, constructed by Mausolus, a satrap in the Persian Empire, for himself and Artemisia II of Caria.
translation: 一座巨大的地上坟墓，由波斯帝国的一位总督摩索拉斯，为自己和卡里亚的阿尔特米西亚二世修建。

original: A hill, deeply sacred to Jewish worshipers, as it is said to be the location of the ancient Temple of Solomon.
translation: 一座对犹太教徒而言及其神圣的山丘，据说是古代所罗门圣殿之所在。

original: For a long time the tallest building in the world, the lighthouse is an impressive construction visible from far away, while also serving its purpose, guiding ships into port.
translation: 这个灯塔很长一段时间里都是世界上最高的建筑，处在很远的地方也能见其高高耸立，同时它还一直保有着引船入港的功能。

original: The grand construction in the province has led to many well-connected roads being made in the realm.
translation: 这个在省内的壮丽建筑与国内众多通达的道路相接。

original: A network of watchtowers and garrisons has been founded across the realm.
translation: 瞭望塔和驻防部队的网络在全国各地被构建了出来。

original: The armaments surrounding the grand construction display a collection of heads on spikes.
translation: 环绕这座雄伟建筑的尖刺上插满了人头。

original: Tends to inspire characters to become §YCruel§!
The tower can be seen from far away.
translation: 这座高塔在很远的地方就能被看见。

original: From an underground furnace, through ducts and vents, warm air is guided through the building.
translation: 从地下的火炉中诞生，通过管道和通风口，温暖的空气被引导着穿过这座建筑。

original: A complex system of pipes and hot water keeps the floor of the building warm.
translation: 管道和热水组成的复杂系统使得建筑物的地板保持着温暖。

original: A special unit of guards are stationed in the province, heightening security around the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
translation: 一队特别的守卫驻扎在行省之中，增强了[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的警戒

original: The ugly creatures sticking out from the facade of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] have an ominous air to them.
translation: 这些从[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]正面探出头的丑陋怪物看起来很不吉利。

original: While intended for ceremony, the bells can also be rung in times of danger, a warning which would be heard all over the province.
translation: 钟不仅可以用于仪式，在发生危险的时候，也能借由它响彻整个省份的响声来发出警告。

original: A beautiful piece of art reflecting a biblical scene.
translation: 描绘着《圣经》中画面的美丽艺术品

original: The arch-headed windows extend to several floors, bestowing the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] with an unparalleled level of grandeur.
translation: 延伸多层的拱形窗让[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]显得无比宏伟。

original: While subterranean passageways are a source of fascination, they are primarily a sacred space for religious practice.
translation: 虽然地底的通道是使人着魔的源头，但这里主要还是用作举行宗教仪式的圣地。

original: On top of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a big cross, embellishing the silhouette of the building.
translation: 一个在[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]顶端的巨大十字架，装点了这座建筑的轮廓。

original: The bells of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] have been coated with a thin layer of gold.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的钟镀上了一层薄薄的黄金。

original: The grand statue of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] impresses both faithful and those foreign to the faith of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的大雕像让信徒和对[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]信仰陌生的人都印象深刻。

original: The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] guards are especially dedicated to the protection of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
The people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] show their devotion to the gods by sacrificing living beings.
translation: [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的子民向神明献祭活物来展现他们对上帝的奉献。

original: In the middle of the grove, a tree is planted. As time passes, its branches will reach as tall as its roots, representing the connection between worlds.
translation: 在树林中央种着一棵树。时光荏苒，这棵树会变得树大根深，象征着两个世界的连接。

original: A secluded series of rooms the Priests and Priestesses can retire to while maintaining communication with the Gods.
translation: 一众僻静的房间，祭祀与女祭司可以在内修行，同时保持与神明的沟通。

original: An area surrounding the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] has been dedicated to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], and contains smaller buildings and open spaces specifically designed to invite a larger number of worshipers.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]周边的一处专用区域，包含一些小型建筑与开放空间，被特别设计以邀请更多信徒。

original: A tower attached to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], to announce the call to prayer.
translation: 一座[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]附带的高塔，用以召唤信众礼拜。

original: An open courtyard with a fountain, for performing ablutions and refreshing the faithful.
translation: 一个带喷泉的开放庭院，以供信众沐浴净身和透气。

original: A symbolic representation of the vault of Heaven, the dome surmounts the Qibla wall.
translation: 礼拜墙顶端的圆顶，是苍穹的具象化。

original: Illumination is essential in a [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], as many prayers happen during the night. Hundreds of decorated lamps create a dazzling effect, with a soft light emanating from each one.
translation: 在[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]照明是必不可少的，因为很多礼拜都是在夜间进行的。装饰精美的吊灯每一盏都散发出柔和的亮光，但上百盏聚在一起就营造出了一种灿烂夺目的效果。

original: Not only for prayer, the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a civic center, caring for those in need.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]不仅可以进行礼拜，同时也是照顾穷困的人的市民中心。

original: The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
A hostel, instilling gratitude in many a tired traveler.
translation: 一座在疲惫的旅人间渐渐获得口碑的客栈。

original: The Talmud instructs that the Synagogue should be taller than the other buildings.
translation: 根据《塔木德》，犹太会堂应当比其他建筑物高。

original: By building an outer garden, the faithful can relax before and after the prayers.
translation: 在礼拜前后，信众都可以在建造好的外部花园内休息。

original: The Torah Ark, where the sacred Torah scrolls are stored, are here given the proper importance.
translation: 妥拉柜是存放神圣的妥拉经卷的柜子，意义重大。

original: Elaborate decorations will help elevate the spirit of the faithful to the heavens.
translation: 精致的装饰有助于振奋信徒对神明的信心。

original: The acoustics of these rooms make them suited for practice singing.
translation: 这些房间出色的音响效果使其适合用于练习歌唱。

original: The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
An extensive library, for housing relevant manuscripts while also providing a quiet study area for the scholar in need of it.
translation: 一座宽敞的图书馆，收藏相关的手稿抄本，同时也为有需求的学者提供了一个安静的研究场所。

original: The sun reflects most brilliantly in the surface of this statue.
translation: 阳光照到这座雕像上时，会反射出美丽的颜色。

original: The moon reflects beautifully in the surface of this statue.
translation: 月光照到这座雕像上时，会反射出美丽的颜色。

original: These beautiful statues are said to resemble the immediate family of [Root.GetTitledName].
translation: 这些美丽的雕像据说形象酷似[Root.GetTitledName]的直系亲属。

original: A stable containing horses, but most importantly, the ones descending from the original chosen creature depicted in the grand monument rising above the roof of this building.
translation: 这座马厩里豢养着马匹，不过最重要的是，这些马匹的祖先是匹精挑细选的骏马，它的纪念像正悬于这座马厩的屋顶上。

original: The original statue is surrounded by smaller statues, depicting critters of various kinds.
translation: 原本的雕塑由描绘着多种动物的稍小一些的雕像围绕着

original: The piers expand the harbor and how much trade that can be conducted there.
translation: 码头扩展了港口，好多贸易都能在此进行。

original: The installation of a proper Harbor office has led to better control of the trade coming and going through the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
translation: 一座合适的港口办公室可以更好地掌控流经[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的贸易。

original: For guiding ships in and out of the harbor.
An area set aside for construction of the navy.
translation: 一个为建造军舰准备的区域。

original: The long-gone relatives of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can be found standing witness to the passing of time, in the dark corridors of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
translation: 在[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]昏暗的走廊中，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]逝去已久的亲属的雕像长久地伫立于此，见证了过去的时光。

original: A massive undertaking allowing the stage to be filled with water for mock naval battles.
translation: 一个大型项目，将舞台灌满水，以模拟海战。

original: Allows for battles with exotic beasts, imported from distant lands.
translation: 为斗兽而留，这些野兽是从遥远的异域进口来的。

original: An attachment to the Amphitheater, for races.
translation: 圆形剧场的附带建筑，用于赛马。

original: An academy to train the fighters who fight in the amphitheater
translation: 一处学院，训练那些将在圆形剧场中角斗的战士

original: A place for chariots to practice and race each other.
translation: 一个用来练习战车和互相切磋的场地。

original: A stage, specifically designed for dramatic readings of poetry and acting.
translation: 为诗朗诵和表演特意设计的舞台

original: Beautiful fountains, attracting small birds, adding to the atmosphere.
translation: 美丽的喷泉，可以吸引小鸟，增添情调。

original: There is an eerie sheen to the water in this well...
translation: 这个井中的水闪烁着怪异的光泽......

original: A marvelous terraced solution to one section of the garden.
translation: 花园的一个奇妙的梯田形部分。

original: A place for hiding. Or romance.
translation: 用来躲迷藏的地方。或者用来做一些浪漫的事。

original: The sweet smell of flowers and thick undergrowth can hide the darkest of secrets...
translation: 芬芳的花朵与茂盛的灌木足以隐藏最黑暗的秘密……

original: Delightful, but deadly, the flowers in this garden carry some powerful properties.
translation: 花园里的花朵具备一些强大的毒性，这使它们美丽而致命，

original: A well-organized patch of land, showing the dedication of its carer.
translation: 这块土地井井有条，体现了它园丁的辛勤奉献。

original: These elegant statues depict people relaxing, presumably to inspire calm in anyone visiting the garden.
translation: 这些雅致的雕塑刻画了休息中的人们，想必能唤起参观花园的人平静的心态。

original: The crown has begun to reserve choice areas and the finest forests in the land for royal hunting trips. Though some grumble, this is widely seen to be simply the monarch's due.
translation: 王室开始占据优质的地块和上好的林地，用以王室狩猎活动。虽然有些许的人会发牢骚，但这被广泛视为君主应有的权利。

original: More than mere hunting preserves, these lands are the private playground of the monarch, and include valuable economic areas.
translation: 这些土地不仅仅是狩猎保护区，也是君主的私人游乐场，其中包含了很多有经济价值的区域。

original: Entire towns are subsumed by this kingdom-within-a-kingdom, and prosperous villages often find that the monarch's men have "discovered" maps placing their settlements firmly inside the nearest royal forest.
translation: 城镇被整个纳入国中之国，繁荣的村庄时常发现他们的居所在王室官吏的地图上，赫然被列进最近的王家狩猎场中。

original: The royal forests now cover over a third of the country, more than the lords, burghers, or clergy individually, and more than the rest of the monarchs' domains in their entirety. It is truly the fourth estate of the realm.
translation: 王家狩猎场现在占了全国的三分之一，比领主、市民和神职人员的地都多，也比君王自己其他所有的直辖领地加起来都多。这真成了国家的第四等级了。

original: Like the new forest, a huge area is designated a kingswood and cleared of the local peasantry.
translation: 一大片区域被划归成王室猎场，当地农民被清扫得一干二净，如同一片新的森林一般。

original: A separate legal system for the royal forests that, where necessary, supersedes the common law of the land.
translation: 一个为王家狩猎场单独设立的法律系统，必要的时候会取代当地的普通法。

original: Law is only as good as the system that backs it up, and now the royal forests have an entire system of courts, wardens, and clerks, backed up by trained magistrates, all ready to enforce the diktats of the crown.
translation: 法律只有通过制度的保障才能生效，现在王家狩猎场拥有了一整套包括法院、看守、书记的制度，在训练有素的治安法官的支持下，他们随时准备着执行王室的法令。

original: Residents of the royal forest have the rights to local mineral deposits, in exchange for their services in war-time.
translation: 王家狩猎场内的居民对当地的矿藏有权开采，他们可以此免于服役。

original: Royal metalworks, royal armories, royal shipwrights, royal carpentries. If it's skilled and in the kingwoods, it belongs to the crown.
translation: 王家冶金厂、王家兵工厂、王家造船厂、王家木工坊。凡是在王室猎场内有技术的工匠，全都属于王室。

original: Reserve and cultivate ship-building timber for sale to your merchants, with the proviso that ships owe a certain amount of service to their lord.
translation: 保留和培育造船用的木料，用来卖给你的商人，附带的条件是造出来的船只需要为其领主提供一定的服务。

original: Establish a ministry that regularly beats the bounds of the royal forests, determining exactly where the edges lay, and pushing them outwards every now and then.
translation: 建立一个部门，定期勘查王家狩猎场的边界，探知边线的具体所在，时不时地还能把这个边界向外扩张一点。

original: Legalize small freeholders to patrol the borders of the kingwoods, in exchange for plots of land from which they can do it.
translation: 让自由保有地产者巡逻王室猎场的边境，作为他们换取对自己份地享有自由保有权的合法依据。

original: Agisters regulate both agistment and pannage, two of the major money-making abrogations for a royal forest. The organizations is not entirely unlike an extra layer of tax stations.
translation: 代牧人既控制着牧牛费，又控制着牧猪费，这两项费用是王家狩猎场最赚钱的排他权。这个机构有点像个额外的收税站。

original: The expansion of crown privileges at the expense of the local populace causes a certain amount of petty discontent with the crown, leading to mild negative events violating forest law.
translation: 王室特权的扩张是以牺牲民众利益为代价的，民众对王室有了一定程度的非议，导致了一些轻微违反王室猎场法的负面事件出现。

original: Reckless expansion of crown privileges continues to infuriate the people who actually live on the land, giving more severe negative events.
translation: 王室特权无度的扩张继续激怒着赖这片土地维生的人，这造成了些更为严重的负面事件。

original: With the most recent advance of the royal forest, the crown's powers are unprecedented. Peasants, clergy, and barons alike all chafe sorely against the start of the perceived-birth of an absolutist monarchy, and a dramatic revolt is sure to follow.
translation: 随着王家狩猎场新近的扩大，王室获得了空前的势力。农民、神职人员和贵族们都不约而同地察觉到这是君主专制诞生的开端，对此他们异常恼怒。一场戏剧性的叛乱定将接踵而至。

original: The dramatic revolts of the past are surely over with the signing of this Great Charter.
translation: 过去戏剧性的叛乱确实随着《大宪章》的签署彻底结束了。

original: An expansion to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], providing ample storage for armor and weaponry.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的扩展建筑，为盔甲和武器提供充裕的存储空间。

original: A tower increasing the line of sight, and safety, for the entire province.
translation: 一座能增加视线范围的高塔，为整个省份带来更多安定。

original: A special vault, deep in the heart of the fortress, for storage and safe-keeping.
translation: 一个位于堡垒核心部分的特制金库，用于存储和保管。

original: A deep trench surrounds this fortress.
translation: 要塞周围环绕着深深的壕沟。

original: At least one craftsman died in the making of this moat.
translation: 至少有一名工匠在制造这些尖刺时不幸去世。

original: Water keeps people at bay. Unless they can swim.
translation: 水能使敌人难以接近，除非他们会游泳。

original: A frightening sight, the moat is said to contain all that remains of those who have personally slighted [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 这景象令人恐惧。据说这条「护城河」里面是所有那些胆敢怠慢[Root.GetTitledFirstName]之人的遗体。

original: A labyrinthine network of tunnels and passageways are said to exist within and under the walls of [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 据说[FromFrom.GetName]的墙壁里与地下隐藏着一座由地道与走廊交织而成的迷宫。

original: Within the walls of the fortress is a small and tranquil garden, serving as a place for the world-weary warrior to recharge his energy.
translation: 在堡垒城墙内的一座静谧的小花园，一个让厌世的战士们恢复精力的场所。

original: A room dedicated to the practice of one-on-one combat.
translation: 用于一对一决斗训练的房间。

original: A secret vault, for storing particularly valuable merchandise.
translation: 秘密地窖，用于储存那些尤为宝贵的商品。

original: A reinforced building structure, designed to prevent damage from earthquakes.
translation: 一个加固建筑的结构，设计用以抵抗地震。

original: There can be no doubt as to who is the owner of this building.
translation: 让人毫无疑问地明白这座建筑的主人是谁。

original: A marvel of engineering, this flame is bigger and lasts longer than others.
translation: 一个工程学的奇迹，火焰比别处更大，燃烧也更持久。

original: There is one person who is ultimately in charge of the lighthouse maintenance. At least on paper.
translation: 有一个人掌管灯塔的维护工作。至少在纸面上。

original: In case of an important guest, the Royal Apartments will provide the level of comfort expected by any sophisticated ruler.
translation: 对于重要的客人，王家套间的舒适度能满足任何见过世面的统治者所期待的标准。

original: A series of impressive natural hollows, these rooms are only partially improved upon by human engineering.
translation: 一系列令人印象深刻的天然孔洞，这些房间仅进行了部分人工改造。

original: These tunnels are hard to navigate, but those with the necessary maps are high-ranking soldiers in need of expedient travel.
translation: 难以辨别方向的隧道，但那些拥有地图高级士兵可以自由地穿梭其中。

original: In the depths of the underground complex, workers have encountered valuable ore, which is now being carefully excavated.
translation: 在地下设施的深处，工人们发现了贵金属及宝石矿，现在正在仔细挖掘。

original: A wooden floor hatch, conveniently located right in front of the royal throne, sends a message to any belligerent visitor.
translation: 一扇木制的地板门，位于王座的正前方，对于任何挑衅的参见者是一种威慑。

original: In memory of beloved family members, the stones show intricate patterns and markings, inspiring deep respect for its craftsmen.
translation: 这块石头用来纪念挚爱的家庭成员，图案复杂雕刻精巧，让人对其雕刻匠人肃然起敬。

original: These works reveal the human soul, the meaning of love, and the tragedy of life.
translation: 这些作品展现了人的灵魂、爱的意义和人生的悲剧。

original: The secrets of building great edifices, roads, and bridges are revealed in the classical works of Vitruvius and other recent authors.
translation: 修建大厦、构筑路桥的奥秘在维特鲁威和一些近人的经典著作中得以揭示。

original: Manuscripts recording the known history of modern civilization and warfare.
translation: 记录关于现代文明和战争已知历史的手稿。

original: By reading what many others observed of the world and creatures that live in it we may gain precious knowledge. Is the world actually flat?
translation: 通过阅读很多前人对这个世界和其中的生物的观察，我们可以获得宝贵的知识。世界确实是平的吗？

original: From the works of Plato, to the most recent treatises on mathematics.
translation: 内容涵盖了柏拉图的著作到最近的数学专著。

original: A room full of scribes, who receive works from all over the world and make copies of them.
translation: 一个满是书吏的房间，他们为来自世界各地的作品制作副本。

original: Outside of the main [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] two smaller, yet similar, monuments can be found. They are said to be resting place of the ones most dear to [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 在主[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]外，能看到两座规模稍小、外形相似的金字塔，据说里面安息着[Root.GetTitledFirstName]最心爱的人。

original: Perhaps a monument to [Root.GetTitledName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself], the statue is mostly reminiscent of a famous beast.
translation: 这个雕塑可能是[Root.GetTitledName][Root.GetHerselfHimself]的纪念像，一般会让人联想到一只著名的神兽。

original: These rooms do not appear to be a part of the original plans for the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]...
translation: 这些房间似乎并不在建造[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的原计划中。

original: Within the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], surrounded by silence and the passing of time, there is a whole underground city for the dead.
translation: 一片死寂和逝去的时光包围着[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]，里面是一整座死者的地下城。

original: Considering the pyramid is a lot like a giant sign proclaiming where to find valuables, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is rumored to have designed a number of intricate traps to scare off grave-robbers.
translation: 金字塔这种地方就像一个写有此处有宝藏的巨大标牌，因此有传闻说[Root.GetTitledFirstName]设计了许多复杂的陷阱，用来吓退盗墓者。

original: The surface of this pyramid is exceptionally smooth, and when it reflects the sun, it sometimes looks like it is emitting a light of its own.
translation: 金字塔的表面罕见地光滑，能直接反射日光，有时看起来仿佛是金字塔自己在发光。

original: Two gigantic Cherubim made out of cedar wood, their outstretched wings touching in the middle of the Holy Place.
translation: 两个香柏木做的巨大的基路伯像，两张张开的翅膀在圣殿中央相接。

original: The outer court is used by the population for worship
translation: 外殿是给大众用来敬神的场所。

original: as long as anyone can remember
inspired many pious men and women
translation: 鼓舞了许多虔诚的男女
把虔诚的人聚集到了一起
鼓舞了学者与勤奋的学生

original: eased the burden of every day life for countless people
translation: 减轻了无数人日常生活的重担。

original: improved the lives of its residents
encouraged greatness in both commoner and noble alike
translation: 鼓励了平民与贵族都追求成为伟人

original: [This.GetName] sends chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
translation: [This.GetName]甚至让最勇敢的人都感到脊背发凉

original: [This.GetName] send chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
translation: [This.GetName]甚至让最勇敢的人都感到脊背发凉

original: [This.GetName] promises safety in times of need
[This.GetName] are said to guarantee its safety, in times of need
translation: [This.GetName]据说在必要时刻可以保护自己

original: stone [This.GetName] are said to keep demons at bay
grand dome is a second sky for its worshipers
translation: 大圆顶对其礼拜者而言相当于第二片天空

original: The [target_wonder.GetName] has become a center for travelers and commerce, and some people have decided to settle close to the [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction. The latest reports mention children, dogs, and cattle — they are obviously putting down deep roots.
translation: [target_wonder.GetName]已经成为游客和商贸的中心，有的人已决定要定居在[target_wonder.GetWonderAdj]建筑附近了。最新的报告提到了儿童、犬只和牛群——显然他们也想扎根于此。

original: They are welcome to stay in [target_province.GetName]!
Drive out the rabble and confiscate their possessions!
translation: 撵走这些暴民，把他们的财产充公！

original: My scribes have been frequenting the [target_wonder.GetName] during their toil to finish my book. As they present me with a new extract it is clear that it has been a great help – the quality of the text is beyond reproach!
translation: 我的书吏在为我辛苦抄写书籍时，一直常去[target_wonder.GetName]。他们向我呈上新的节录本，无疑这本书会非常有用——文章质量也无可指摘。

original: My scribes will shine with this [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction's help!
translation: 在这座[target_wonder.GetWonderAdj]建筑的助益下，我的书吏会大放异彩。

original: You encourage your scribes to use the [target_wonder.GetName], guaranteeing a better quality of work
translation: 你鼓励你的书吏使用[target_wonder.GetName]，以保障更好的作品质量。

original: Drink from the Fountain of Youth
The life-giving waters of the fountain is said to be able to wash away the effects of aging in anyone who drinks it.
translation: 这泉水据说有给予人生命，洗净衰老的功效。

original: Drank too recently — cannot drink it again until §Y[Root.drank_from_fountain_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 最近才饮用——在§Y[Root.drank_from_fountain_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!之前无法再饮用

original: Unlocks the §YDrink from the Fountain of Youth§! decision
translation: 解锁§Y饮用青春之泉§!的决议

original: I jump into the [target_wonder.GetName], laughing with glee, and I am soon choking on the life-giving water as I swallow mouthful after mouthful. As I drag myself up onto the ledge with shaking arms I soon stop smiling...
translation: 我欢笑着纵身跃入[target_wonder.GetName]，我一口接一口地咽下这长生之水，差点没把我呛着。当我用颤抖的双臂爬上岸边的岩石时，我的笑意很快消失了......

original: The years fall off me as I drink.
translation: 年华被我从身上喝走了。

original: I've never felt this old before!
translation: 我以前从没觉得自己有这么老！

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves responsible and can be entrusted with the care of your lighthouse – keeping it both lit and functioning.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出责任心，并可以被委托照看灯塔的人物——责任包括保持它的燃烧以及正常运转。
解锁§Y灯塔托管人§!的荣誉头衔

original: Steady as a rock, and with immovable discipline, the custodian is responsible for the care of the stones.
translation: 看守人严守纪律，意志坚如磐石，负责照管巨石。

original: Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Stone§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y磐石守卫§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves steadfast in their loyalty and discipline.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出忠贞不渝、严于律己的人物。

original: The colossal monoliths of this construction already inspire both awe and admiration – imagine the impact of even more stones!
translation: 这座建筑的巨石让人既敬畏又钦佩——想象一下有更多巨石会有怎样的效果！

original: A crown made of pure gold encircles the magnificent head of the statue.
translation: 一顶纯金做成的王冠环绕着雕像宏伟的头部。

original: Anyone seeking passage through this area will be sternly encouraged to donate a small sum to the crown.
translation: 任何想要通过这个区域的人都会被要求向国王捐一小笔钱。

original: A dedicated place for your beloved horses to rest forever more.
translation: 一个供你的爱马永远安息的地方。

original: A quiet and serene place for all pets to find eternal rest.
translation: 一个宁静安谧的地方，宠物可以长眠于此。

original:
Blue indicates realms that are within diplomatic range of the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Green indicates realms that have a peace treaty with the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Purple indicates realms that are paying tribute to the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Red indicates the realm of the §Y[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle]§!.
translation:
蓝色表示该领地处在§Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!的外交范围内。
绿色表示该领地与§Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!有和平条约。
紫色表示该领地正在向§Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!朝贡。
红色表示该领地属于§Y[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle]§!。

original: §Y[This.GetName]§! is being built and is of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
§Y[This.GetName]§! is not being built or is not of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
A feature is being built for §Y[This.GetName]§!
A feature is not being built for §Y[This.GetName]§!
translation: 没有正在为§Y[This.GetName]§!修建附属建筑

original: §Y[This.GetName]§! has been built and is of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
§Y[This.GetName]§! has not been built or is not of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
The current stage is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ years old
Ownership of $WONDER_NAME|Y$ was transferred from $OLD_OWNER|Y$ to $NEW_OWNER|Y$
§RYou can not resume construction if you are bankrupt§!
translation: §R如果你破产了你就不能重新开始建造§!

original: §RYou can not resume construction if you are bankrupt§!
translation: §R如果你破产了你就不能重新开始建造§!

original: Construction cost will be $TICKING_COST|R$¤per month for $TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$ reaching an estimated total cost of $ESTIMATED_TOTAL|R$¤.
translation: 建造成本将是每月$TICKING_COST|R$¤，持续$TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$，预计总成本$ESTIMATED_TOTAL|R$¤。

original: $MEMBER$ and their offspring are now considered part of the $BLOODLINE$
translation: $MEMBER$以及他们的后裔现下被认为是$BLOODLINE$的一员

original: $TITLE|Y$ refuses to raise their troops under your command due to previously being expelled from your realm.
translation: $TITLE|Y$拒绝在你的命令下集结军队，因为从前被你驱逐出境。

original: Currently constructing the next stage of the $WONDER$
translation: 当前正在建造$WONDER$的下一阶段

original: Do you want to build a new $WONDER_TYPE_NAME$?
Cancel is not allowed for this event
Construction of the next stage has started for §Y[This.GetName]§!
translation: 已经为§Y[This.GetName]§!开始了下一阶段的建造

original: Construction of the next stage has not started for §Y[This.GetName]§!
translation: 还没有为§Y[This.GetName]§!开始下一阶段的建造

original: Construction of a §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§! stage has been started in §Y[This.GetName]§!
Construction of §Y[This.GetName]§! has been started and is of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
translation: §Y[This.GetName]§!的建造已经开始了并且是§Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!类型

original: Construction of a §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§! stage has not been started in §Y[This.GetName]§!
§Y[This.GetFirstName]§! has not started constructing a §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§! stage
Construction of §Y[This.GetName]§! has not been started or is not of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
translation: §Y[This.GetName]§!的建设还没有开始或不是§Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!类型

original: Construction of a feature has started for §Y[This.GetName]§!
Construction of §Y$WONDER_UPGRADE_TYPE$§! has been started in §Y[This.GetName]§!
Construction of §Y[This.GetName]§! has been started and is of type §Y$WONDER_UPGRADE_TYPE$§!
Construction of §Y$WONDER_UPGRADE_TYPE$§! has not been started in §Y[This.GetName]§!
Construction of §Y[This.GetName]§! has not been started or is not of type §Y$WONDER_UPGRADE_TYPE$§!
translation: §Y[This.GetName]§!的建设还没有开始或不是§Y$WONDER_UPGRADE_TYPE$§!类型

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to build a glorious building of great prestige!
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想建造一座有巨大声望的辉煌建筑。

original: was impaled on the spikes of a great building by $KILLER$
translation: 被$KILLER$穿在奇观外的尖刺上

original: was impaled on the spikes of a great building
translation: 被穿在奇观外的尖刺上

original: was impaled on spikes, in the moat of a great fortress, by $KILLER$
translation: 被$KILLER$穿在城堡护城河里的尖刺上

original: was impaled on spikes in the moat of a great fortress
translation: 被穿在城堡护城河里的尖刺上

original: was starved to death, in the moat of $KILLER$
was starved to death in a moat
was drowned, in the moat of $KILLER$
Best not to ask too many questions, lest you end up here.
translation: 不想死的话就别问太多问题。

original: A throne made of skulls and bones, supported by a frame of iron.
translation: 用骷髅与白骨堆砌成的王座，以铁架支撑。

original: A throne made entirely of gold, not even gilded, just completely gold. What a waste.
translation: 通体由黄金打造的宝座，甚至没有镀金，就是纯金打造。真是浪费啊。

original: A brewery to create your own alcohol. While unlikely to turn a profit, it might make you popular.
translation: 一间能让你自行产酒的酿酒厂，尽管不太可能赢利，却可以使你变得受欢迎。

original: As you have a §YBrewery§!, you can send [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a [Root.GetAlcoholContainerType] of [Root.GetAlcohol].
translation: 由于你有一座§Y酿酒厂§!，你可以把[Root.GetAlcoholContainerType][Root.GetAlcohol]送给[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has not recently sent a gift of alcohol.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]最近并没有送过酒水类礼物

original: A place to grow grapes and make them into wine.
translation: 种葡萄并用葡萄酿酒的地方

original: An incredibly ostentatious bedroom, fit for nobility.
translation: 一间华丽得难以置信的、适合贵族的卧室。

original: A beautiful mural depicting a scene from the history of your dynasty.
translation: 描绘着你家族历史中一幕的壁画

original: The Eternal Flame is constantly tended, to ensure it never goes out.
translation: 永恒烈焰被不断地照料以保证它永不熄灭。

original: It is unclear who these tombs were made for, but rumor has it you can sometimes hear voices from within.
translation: 我们不清楚这是谁的墓地，但据传言，你有时能听见从里面传出声音。

original: This statue depicts four horses pulling a chariot.
translation: 这座雕像表现了四匹马拉着一辆战车。

original: A prayer hall that surrounds the stupas.
A descendant of the sacred tree in under which Siddhartha Gautama, the spiritual teacher who became known as the Buddha, attained enlightenment.
translation: 乔达摩·悉达多在这棵圣树的祖先的树荫下悟道，他是以佛陀之名为世人所知的精神导师。

original: The shelter and living quarters for the Buddhist Monks who live here.
translation: 佛教僧侣栖身立命之所。

original: A school where Buddhist teachings are taught.
This is where the remains of Buddha and his disciples are interred.
translation: 这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。

original: This is where the objects belonging to Buddha and his disciples are interred.
translation: 这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。

original: Built to commemorative events in lives of Buddha and his disciples.
translation: 为纪念佛陀及其弟子的生平事迹而建造。

original: Walls specifically added to defend from sea attacks.
translation: 专门添加能防御海上攻击的城墙。

original: The city's defenses have begun to spill out onto the land, with ropes of well-maintained walls crisscrossing the main approach to the burgh. Adding extra bastions to these will bulge the amount of walkable perimeter (and so how many troops can man them) without noticeably increasing cost.
translation: 这座城市的防线开始延伸，通往城镇的主干道上纵横交错着维护良好的城墙。增添额外的堡垒会扩充巡逻的周长（当然也会增加配套部队的数量），这并不会明显地增加花费。

original: A city is nothing without its countryside, and this city takes that seriously. Vital local townships are now guarded by their own fortifications, paid for and maintained by the capital-settlement, and the closest are even connected by short walls to form a single, defensible sprawl.
translation: 城市离开乡村便一无是处，这座城市就深谙其道。当地重要的城镇现在都有了自己的城防护卫，他们通过资金协议来支付和维护城防，相邻的城镇甚至以矮墙相连，构建出一条单一的防线延伸。

original: These dire, imposing stoneworks punch upwards like massive, artificial fists. Crowned with rows of bastions and studded with fortified towers, none may approach without being seen, and no amount of lesser walls captured will stop the enfilading from their legions of archers.
translation: 这些壮观的石制建筑像大量挥向天空的人造拳头。以堡垒为冠，以高塔为饰，没有人能在不被发现的情况下接近此城，即使小城墙被攻占也无法阻止弓箭兵团进行纵射。

original: Secreted behind sewer shafts, diving under the moats, cut into the side of obscuring bastions: the defenders of this city strike often and without warning from their many and varied hiding places, before vanishing back into the night.
translation: 这些城门隐藏在下水道之后，深埋于城壕之下，从堡垒隐蔽的一侧凿出：这个城市的防守者经常从他们变换多样的藏身处中毫无征兆地出来突袭一番，又消失在茫茫夜色之中。

original: Turn each gatehouse into a full-scale fortress in its own right, and so turn each layer of the walls into a separate mini-siege.
translation: 将每一座门楼都彻底转变为一座堡垒，因而让城墙的每一层都能单独承受起一场小型围城战。

original: Planned routes through the defenses that are simple, clear, devoid of cover, and looked over by the maximum possible number of defenses, always with a difficult fortress guarding the next killing ground along.
translation: 贯穿防御区的规划路线简单清晰，没有掩护，能被尽可能最多的防御区俯瞰到，其间总是有一座易守难攻的城堡护卫着近旁的杀戮场。

original: Adapt and reshape areas of the defenses to be especially vulnerable to attack from the next layer, turning losses for the defenders into massacres for the attackers.
translation: 调整、重塑防御区，让其易于从防御后方进行攻击，将防御者的损失转变为对进攻者的屠杀。

original: Redirect local rivers and channel defensive islands out of the sea itself, adding a naval element to any siege that few attackers are equipped to deal with.
translation: 改变当地河流的流向，从海上引水道划分出防御岛，为其增添海军元素，使得围攻者对此难以应付。

original: Allows more options when §YFinding a Smith§!.
translation: §Y寻找铁匠§!时你能有更多的选项。

original: Bells that once stood on a Christian Cathedral.
translation: 这座大钟曾是一座基督教座堂的一部分

original: A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God.
translation: 一座象征神体、神座和神之居所的神庙。

original: A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God. It is a sign of its builder §YKarma§! and §YPrestige§!, and can also influence the opinion of some of your subjects.
translation: 一座象征神体、神座和神之居所的神庙，是其建造者§Y善业§!和§Y威望§!的体现，也会影响到臣民对你的好感。

original: An richly ornate high tower that serves as an entrance to the temple.
translation: 一座富丽堂皇的高塔，是通向神庙的入口。

original: A great pillared hall serving as the waiting room for pilgrims and devotees.
translation: 一座带廊柱的大厅，供朝圣者和信徒在此休息等候。

original: A complex of smaller temples, surrounding the main temple.
translation: 环绕主神庙的小型神庙建筑群。

original: A school, that also provides lodging for students and scholars.
translation: 一座学校，同时也为学生和学者提供住宿。

original: A hospital attached to the temple.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its bells can even warn the people of danger.
translation: 这个建筑证明了建造者的§Y虔诚§!与§Y威望§!，可以用来存放圣物，有麻烦时里面的大钟也能向人们发出警报。

original: A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can help convert the infidels to the true faith, improve opinion, or even help protect the population from diseases.
translation: 这个建筑证明了建造者的§Y虔诚§!与§Y威望§!，有助于将异教徒引至正信，提升好感，甚至还能保护百姓免遭疾病。

original: A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can also help improve opinion of you, the morale of the military forces, and reduce revolt risk.
translation: 这个建筑证明了建造者的§Y虔诚§!与§Y威望§!，有助于提升他人对你的好感，振奋部队士气，降低叛乱风险。

original: A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder, the temple can improve your subjects' opinion of you, and lower revolt risk.
translation: 这个神庙证明了其建造者的§Y威望§!，有助于改善臣民对你的好感，并降低叛乱风险。

original: A testament to the §YKarma§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its walls can protect the people from danger.
translation: 这个建筑证明了建造者的§Y善业§!，可以用来存放圣物，有危险时它的高墙也能保护人们。

original: Immortalizing a ruler in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from your family and vassals.
translation: 为统治者塑造不朽的大雕像能够证明建造者及其继承人的§Y威望§!，还能改善家族和封臣对你的好感。

original: Immortalizing a horse in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from horse loving vassals.
translation: 为一匹马塑造不朽的大雕像能够证明建造者及其继承人的§Y威望§!，还能改善爱马封臣对你的好感。

original: An imposing construction, it will make the province much harder to conquer. Added Facilities can improve considerably the military capabilities of its owner.
translation: 一座雄伟壮观的建筑，会使得这个省份难以被征服，增添设施能显著提升建筑所有者的军事力量。

original: Building an underground city can increase your intrigue capabilities and you can even find a precious metal deposit.
translation: 通过建造地下城市，你能提升自己的密谋能力，甚至还能找到贵金属的矿床。

original: The construction of massive city walls and other defensive structures will surely protect the province against besieging enemy armies.
translation: 巨大的城墙与其他防御建筑的建造无疑将从围城敌军手下保护省份。

original: A Great Harbor with storehouses will dominate trade in the area, thus bringing revenues. It can also increase our maritime military capabilities, including in sieges.
translation: 有仓库的大海港会主导这片区域的贸易，带来收益。同时也能增强我们的海上军事能力，包括围攻能力。

original: Illuminating the darkness and guiding ships to the safety of your port, the Lighthouse can increase trade and tax revenues. It can even be used as a place for you to rest.
translation: 灯塔可以照亮黑暗，把船只引导到你安全的港口，它能提升贸易收入与税收，甚至还能用做你的休息之处。

original: An epitome of popular culture, it serves to entertain with great spectacles, lowering the revolt risk. It can also allow for the recruitment of specially trained individuals.
translation: 流行文化的缩影，靠优秀的表演娱乐大众，降低叛乱风险，也包含招募受过专业训练的人才的功能。

original: A regal symbol of the Prestigious lineage of its builder, it can also be equipped with a number of facilities that help the builder with their love life or court intrigue.
translation: 建造者显赫家世的尊贵象征，可以在其上建造多种设施，它们将在爱情生活或宫廷阴谋上给予建造者帮助。

original: The garden will be a marvel of both science and beauty, and can help you with matters related to §YHealth§!, love life, or even intrigue.
translation: 花园将是科学与美学双重意义上的奇迹，能在与§Y健康§!，爱情生活，甚至是密谋相关的事务上给予你帮助。

original: A great place of learning will help with §YCultural§! and other technological advances. The presence of so many learned persons can even increase your personal §YSkills§!.
translation: 学术圣地将在§Y文化§!与其他科技的进步上提供帮助。如此多的饱学之士的存在甚至能提升你的§Y个人能力§!。

original: A place to collect, store and reproduce the great written works, it will allow you to find and use many books.
translation: 搜集、保存与复制优秀书籍的地方，你能在这里查找利用许多书籍。

original: A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, it is a place to honor the dead. It can also be used to intimidate friends and foes alike.
translation: 这个建筑证明了建造者及其继承人的§Y威望§!，是纪念死者的场所，也可以被用来吓唬人，无论敌友。

original: A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help improve opinion of you and even help protect your treasures.
translation: 这个建筑证明了你的§Y虔诚§!和§Y威望§!，有助于提升他人对你的好感，甚至还能保护你的财宝。

original: A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can also help  improve your subjects's opinion of you.
translation: 这个建筑证明了你的§Y虔诚§!和§Y威望§!，有助于改善臣民对你的好感。

original: A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help  improve opinion of you, help protect your treasures, and can even be used for sacrifices to the Gods.
translation: 这个建筑证明了你的§Y虔诚§!和§Y威望§!，有助于提升他人对你的好感，保护你的财宝，甚至还能被用作向神献祭的场所。
纪念一位优秀的统治者

original: Refused to Honor a Hated Ruler
translation: 拒绝纪念一位受憎恨的统治者
纪念一位受憎恨的统治者

original: ... I take [target_character.GetHerHis] hand, and kiss [target_character.GetHerHim] passionately.

I went to the [target_wonder.GetName], to meet [From.GetFirstName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName]. I didn't have to wait long for the [From.GetManWoman] to pull me towards [From.GetHerHim], eager to demonstrate how much [From.GetSheHe] has missed me.
translation: 我到[target_wonder.GetName]僻静的[target_upgrade.GetName]里与[From.GetFirstName]见面。没等多久这个[From.GetManWoman]就把我拉进[From.GetHerHim]怀里，急不可耐地想证明[From.GetSheHe]到底有多想我。

original: The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in the company of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], or maybe in the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. And thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have the ability to properly honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in death.
translation: 伟大的[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]去世了。他现在或许已与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]作伴，又或许是与[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]为伍。但在此时此地，我必须选定如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。多亏了有[target_wonder.GetName]，我才能妥善安葬[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。

original: The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in Heaven in the company of the saints and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], or maybe in Hell in the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].
translation: 伟大的[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]去世了。他现在或许已身在天堂，与圣人和[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]作伴；又或许是身处地狱，与[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]为伍。但在此时此地，我必须选定如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap]遗体可以长眠于[target_wonder.GetName]之中。

original: The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in Jannah accompanied by the Houris, or maybe in Jahannam suffering the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].
translation: 伟大的[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]去世了。他现在或许已身在天园，有美女作伴；又或许是身在火狱，与[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]为伍。但在此时此地，我必须选定如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap]遗体可以长眠于[target_wonder.GetName]之中。

original: The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead, waiting the end of times. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].
translation: 伟大的[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]去世了，灵魂等待着末日的来临。但在此时此地，我必须选定如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap]遗体可以长眠于[target_wonder.GetName]之中。

original: The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead, [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHis] soul awaiting rebirth in the great cycle of life. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. And thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have the ability to properly honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in death.
translation: 伟大的[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]去世了，[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHis]灵魂等待着轮回转世。但在此时此地，我必须选定如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。多亏了有[target_wonder.GetName]，我才能妥善安葬[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]。

original: I will commit [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] to earth in a ceremony that shall be remembered!
translation: 我会举办一场让人铭记的葬礼，让[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]入土为安。

original: You invite all people to come and pay homage to §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]§! in a grandiose ceremony.
translation: 你邀请所有人来参加一个浮华的仪式，以向§Y[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]§!致敬。

original: The people will know I respect the dead!
translation: 人们会知道我是尊重死者的！

original: You organize a traditional ceremony and invite all the powerful vassals to attend.
translation: 你组织了一场传统的仪式，邀请所有强力封臣来参加。

original: I will honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in a private ceremony.
translation: 我会在私人仪式中悼念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的。

original: [target_dead_ruler.GetFirstNameWithNick] does not deserve a proper burial!
Those who liked §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§! are upset with you. Those who hated [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] are pleased.
translation: 那些爱戴§Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§!的人对你很失望，而憎恨[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的人却很满意。

original: It was a great Feast in the honor of [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] and the Gods. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body now rests in peace in the [target_wonder.GetName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].
translation: 这是一个纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]和诸神的盛大节日.[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap]遗体现在安眠于[target_wonder.GetName]。所有人都将记住我是如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的。

original: It was a memorable funeral and procession full of honors for [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body now rests in peace in the [target_wonder.GetName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].
translation: 这场葬礼和送葬队伍令人难忘，让[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]极尽哀荣。[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap]遗体现在安眠于[target_wonder.GetName]。所有人都将记住我是如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的。

original: It was a memorable funeral and procession full of honors for [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].
translation: 这场葬礼和送葬队伍令人难忘，让[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]极尽哀荣。所有人都将记住我是如何纪念[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的。

original: Those who liked §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§! improve their opinion of you.[Root.GetBigBurialHaterSentence]
translation: 那些爱戴§Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§!的人改善了他们对你的好感。[Root.GetBigBurialHaterSentence]

original: Those who hated [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] might not be pleased.
translation: 那些憎恶[target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]的人或许会不满意。

original: You can store a §Yrelic§! in one of your great works.
translation: 你能在一座你的奇观里保存§Y圣物§!。

original: You can store a relic, like the §Y[target_artifact_1.GetName]§!, in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.
translation: 你可以把像§Y[target_artifact_1.GetName]§!这样的一件圣物，保存在§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!里。
你拥有一件神圣的宝物

original: You spend many hours contemplating the wondrous [target_artifact_1.GetName] in your possession. Surely a fitting place for such a relic would be the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.
translation: 你花了几个小时端详你珍藏的那件奇异的[target_artifact_1.GetName]。想必适合保存这样一件圣物的地方就是§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!了吧。

original: You spend many hours contemplating the wondrous [target_artifact_1.GetName] and the holy [target_artifact_2.GetName] in your possession. A fitting place to keep one of the relics would be the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.
translation: 你花了几个小时端详你珍藏的那件奇异的[target_artifact_1.GetName]和神圣的[target_artifact_2.GetName]。适合保存其中一件圣物的地方就是§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!了吧。

original: Your collection of wondrous and holy relics like the [target_artifact_1.GetName], the [target_artifact_2.GetName], and the [target_artifact_3.GetName] is astonishing and the envy of the world. A fitting place to keep one of the relics would be the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.
translation: 你珍藏的像[target_artifact_1.GetName]、[target_artifact_2.GetName]和[target_artifact_3.GetName]这类奇异而神圣的圣物，令世人既惊叹又忌妒。适合保存其中一件圣物的地方就是§Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!的§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!了吧。

original: I will store the [target_artifact_1.GetName] in the [target_upgrade.GetName].
The §Y[This.GetName]§! will be stored forever in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!. You will not be able to get it back.
translation: §Y[This.GetName]§!会被永久保存在§Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§!。你再也不能拿回来了。

original: I will store the [target_artifact_2.GetName] in the [target_upgrade.GetName].
I will store the [target_artifact_3.GetName] in the [target_upgrade.GetName].
I will store the [target_artifact_4.GetName] in the [target_upgrade.GetName].
No, maybe this is not such a good idea.
translation: 不，这可能并不是个好主意。

original: Suddenly everything goes dark, and a powerful voice echoes in your head: 'What have you done?' Then you feel pain as lightning strikes you, and the world around you dissolves. Your last thoughts are...
translation: 突然，一片漆黑，一个强有力的声音在你脑中回响：「你干了什么？」接着你感到一阵雷劈般的剧痛，周围的世界在慢慢散去。你最后想的是……

original: I hope my successor does not do the same mistake.
translation: 希望我的继承人别犯同样的错误。

original: All walls of the province's holdings will be upgraded to their maximum level.
translation: 该省份所有地产的城墙将会被升级至最高等级。

original: Defenders will have more chances of actively resisting sieges.
translation: 防御者将有更多机会积极抵抗围攻。

original: The last fortifications of the [target_upgrade.GetName] for my [target_wonder.GetName] have been finally finished. Now, even the small townships in the province of [target_province.GetName] are protected by these great defensive works!
translation: 在我的[target_wonder.GetName]中，历时已久的防御工事[target_upgrade.GetName]终于建设完成。现在，即使是[target_province.GetName]的一处小小乡镇，都处于这些伟大防御工事的严密保护之下！
我总喜欢有更多的保护。

original: All walls of [target_province.GetName] holdings are upgraded to their maximum level.
translation: [target_province.GetName]省份所有地产的城墙将会被升级至最高等级。

original: Your courtier [target_courtier.GetBestName] comes to you and says [target_courtier.GetSheHe] acquired [looted_artifact.GetName] from looting the [target_wonder.GetWonderTypeShort]. [target_courtier.GetSheHeCap] would like to gift it to you.
