translation: 你的廷臣[target_courtier.GetBestName]来告诉你，[target_courtier.GetSheHe]从对[target_wonder.GetWonderTypeShort]的劫掠中获得了[looted_artifact.GetName]。[target_courtier.GetSheHeCap]想作为礼物献给你。

original: Thank you, I accept this offer gladly.
translation: 谢谢你，我很乐意接受这份礼物。

original: I thank you, but you can keep it to yourself.
translation: 我很感谢，不过你可以自己留着。

original: As your men start to loot the [From.GetUnfinished][From.GetName], many in [FromFrom.GetName] are upset that you are destroying their heritage.
translation: 当你的士兵开始劫掠[From.GetUnfinished]的[From.GetName]时，在[FromFrom.GetName]的很多人都很失望，因为你正在毁坏他们的遗产。

original: As people see your men starting to tear down the [From.GetUnfinished] [From.GetName], they become upset. Something has to be done to avoid public unrest.
translation: 当人们看到你的士兵开始拆除[From.GetUnfinished]的[From.GetName]，他们变得很失望。必须做些什么来避免公众动乱了。

original: I post guards so that nobody interferes.
translation: 我会派驻守卫，这样就没人干涉了。

original: I open the [From.GetWonderTypeShort] for everybody to have a share of the profit.
translation: 我会开放[From.GetWonderTypeShort]，让所有人都能分一杯羹。

original: The §Y[From.GetName]§! is now nothing but rubble, its former glory lost forever. And I got [global_loot.GetValue] gold from it.
translation: §Y[From.GetName]§!现在除了一堆瓦砾什么都没有了，往日的辉煌消失得无影无踪。我从劫掠中获得了[global_loot.GetValue]金币。

original: The looting of the §Y[From.GetName]§! gave me [global_loot.GetValue] gold. And there is still more to come!
translation: 对§Y[From.GetName]§!的劫掠给我带来了[global_loot.GetValue]金币。将来还有更多收益等着我！

original: These bells were taken during the looting of the [target_wonder.GetName].
translation: 这些钟是从对[target_wonder.GetName]的劫掠中缴获的。

original: §YArtifacts§! are less likely to be stolen
been a hot spot for court intrigue and gossip
translation: 成为了一个宫廷密谋和流言传播的热门地点

original: been a house of envy and admiration
translation: 成为了一座羡慕嫉妒集于一身的房子

original: been a safe haven for lost souls
translation: 成为了迷失的灵魂安全的避风港

original: been a place of comfort for all [Root.Religion.GetName] followers
translation: 成为了使[Root.Religion.GetName]信众得到安慰的地方

original: lent protection to those in need
translation: 为需要帮助的人提供了保护
成为了一个壮丽的奇景

original: been bringing traffic and tourism to the area

translation: 成为了一个成功的旅游景点

original: been the nobility's favorite place of leisure and rejuvenation
translation: 成为了贵族们最爱的休闲养生之地

original: been a source of solemn veneration
translation: 成为了庄严肃穆的源头

original: been an impressive feat of architecture
translation: 成为了一个建筑学上的丰功伟业

original: inspired the imagination of its visitors
[This.GetName] is said to be the envy of any educated gardener
translation: [This.GetName]据说令其他受过良好教育的园丁很是忌妒

original: [This.GetName] brings comfort to bereaved pet owners from all layers of society
translation: [This.GetName]为社会各阶层失去心爱宠物的主人带来安慰

original: [This.GetName] lends moral support and a watching eye to the surrounding area
translation: [This.GetName]为周围的区域提供了精神支持和监督

original: [This.GetName] is rumored to keep people on their toes
[This.GetName] contribute[This.GetSingularS] to a heightened security in the area
translation: [This.GetName]有助于提升这片区域的安全度

original: [This.GetName] bring[This.GetSingularS] an unparalleled feeling of luxury during cold seasons
translation: [This.GetName]在寒冬中带来了无与伦比的奢侈感

original: [This.GetName] act[This.GetSingularS] as a source of rare entertainment in the area
translation: [This.GetName]充当了此地少有的娱乐来源

original: [This.GetName] can be seen from far away
[This.GetName] installed by the owner signal[This.GetSingularS] a certain expectation of obedience
translation: [This.GetName]表明了安装它的主人某种希望他人对自己服从的期待

original: [This.GetName] is rumored to be the best in the realm
[This.GetName] are bringing in extra finances from the area

translation: [This.GetName]给疲惫不堪的旅人提供了短暂的歇息

original: This construction has been severely damaged by pillaging, and would require labor to be restored.
translation: 这个建筑因被洗劫而严重受损，需要人力修复。

original: This construction has been almost completely destroyed, looted for anything of value, and is now but a shadow of its former glory.
translation: 这座建筑几近全毁，任何值钱的东西都被劫掠走了，现在所留下的只是过去荣光的残影。

original: Lively conversations, flowing drinks, and a warm fire – there is no better place to relax after a long day!
translation: 这里有充满活力的对话，供人畅饮的饮品，还有一团温暖的火——想在漫长的一天过后休息，没有比这更好的地方了！
可能会使你缓解§Y紧张不安§!

original: Warm light, accompanied by the lively murmur of conversation, spills out of the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] as [drinking_buddy.GetTitledName] and I walk past.\n\n"What do you say about a cup of something soothing?"
translation: [target_wonder.GetName]旁边的酒馆泛出温和的灯光，伴随着活跃的低语，[drinking_buddy.GetTitledName]和我恰好从旁走过。\n\n「要不整上一杯能解忧的东西？」

original: There might be consequences to this
translation: 这恐怕会有什么不好的后果吧

original: I am more interested in continuing our discussion.
translation: 我对继续我们刚才的谈话更感兴趣。

original: After my initial visit to the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have not been able to keep away. More often than not I find myself seeking the comfort of a big cup of [Root.GetAlcohol] after a long day.
translation: 自从第一次进了[target_wonder.GetName]旁的酒馆后，我便再难脱身。我往往发觉自己终日都在寻求大杯[Root.GetAlcohol]]带来的慰藉。

original: The retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
translation: 驻扎在[target_wonder.GetName]的近卫军帮助我围剿并处决了在§Y[Root.GetName]§!为祸一方的强盗团伙。

original: The temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
translation: [target_wonder.GetName]的神庙守卫帮助我围剿并处决了在§Y[Root.GetName]§!为祸一方的强盗团伙。

original: Due to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great Martial ability, the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§! have been rounded up and executed!
translation: 因为有[target_wonder.GetName]的帮助，加上我超凡的军事能力，在§Y[Root.GetName]§!为祸一方的强盗团伙已经被剿灭处死了。

original: Thanks to the retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.
translation: 多亏了驻扎在[target_wonder.GetName]的近卫军，再加上我高超的外交技巧，§Y[Root.GetName]§!的走私团伙被一网打尽。最后一个走私犯的脑袋现在还烂在矛尖上的呢。

original: Thanks to the temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.
translation: 由于我杰出的外交手段与[target_wonder.GetName]的神庙守卫，§Y[Root.GetName]§!的走私集团已经被摧毁了。最后一名走私者的首级悬挂在城门外的矛尖上，已经开始腐烂了。

original: Thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.
translation: 多亏了[target_wonder.GetName]，再加上我高超的外交技巧，§Y[Root.GetName]§!的走私团伙被一网打尽。最后一个走私犯的脑袋现在还烂在矛尖上的呢。

original: I kneel beside a fountain in the [target_wonder.GetName] and lower a cup into the water. As I drink deeply a tingling sensation spreads in my whole body, and I am left with energy and vigor I haven't felt in years!
translation: 我跪倒在[target_wonder.GetName]的水边，伏身舀了一杯水。我一口饮下，一阵颤栗传遍周身，我浑身充满了久违多年的激情和活力。

original: May kill anyone who tries to conquer the [FromFrom.GetName]
translation: 可能杀死试图征服[FromFrom.GetName]的人

original: While exploring the depths of the [target_wonder.GetName], both [target_courtier.GetTitledName] and [target_courtier_2.GetTitledName] were caught in one of the deadly traps spread within the structure. What we recovered was barely enough to recognize them by...
translation: 当探索到[target_wonder.GetName]的深处时，[target_courtier.GetTitledName]和[target_courtier_2.GetTitledName]都中了陷阱，这些致命陷阱遍布于这个建筑之内。我们仅能勉强从找回来的断臂残肢体中辨认身份......

original: Word has reached me that the traps I installed in the depths of the [target_wonder.GetName] have claimed [target_courtier.GetTitledName] and [target_courtier_2.GetTitledName] as victims! Apparently they were both mangled almost past recognition.
translation: 有消息传来，说我在[target_wonder.GetName]深处布置的陷阱让[target_courtier.GetTitledName]和[target_courtier_2.GetTitledName]丧命了！显然他们俩会死得不成人形。

original: With eyes downcast in vigilance, the Guardian of the Deep is as unmovable and eternal as the stones found in the depths.
translation: 深渊守护者保持警惕，双眼俯视，他矢志不渝的坚定如同深渊下的磐石。

original: Unlocks the §YGuardian of the Deep§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y深渊守护者§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional vigilance and steadfastness.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出异常警惕和坚定不移的人物。

original: The Watcher of Giants is responsible for the large statues in the area.
translation: 巨像守望者负责维护这片区域里的大型雕像。

original: Unlocks the §YWatcher of Giants§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y巨像守望者§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional vigilance and skills of observation, and they are ultimately responsible for the maintenance and upkeep of the great statue.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出异常警惕和出色的观察力的人物，他们最终负责对大雕像的维护和保养。

original: Constantly walking the wall, the Walker of the Wall is one of the few who knows it inside and out.
translation: 日常行走在城墙上，城墙行者是极少数了解这座城墙的里里外外的人之一。

original: Unlocks the §YWalker of the Wall§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y城墙行者§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown diligence and can spend the majority of their day on their feet, inspecting and maintaining the wall.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出勤奋的人物，他会终日奔波，负责检查和维护城墙。

original: Ultimately responsible for all things marine – every living soul in the Harbor answers to the Master of the Tides.
translation: 基本上对所有的海事负责——海港之内每个生灵都会响应潮汐之主。

original: Unlocks the §YMaster of the Tides§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y潮汐之主§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown aptitude for all things marine, and the overarching responsibility of the §YHarbor§! rests on their shoulders.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出对所有海事有天赋的人物，§Y港口§!的首要职责落在他们的肩上。

original: With a booming voice the Master of the Games can tease forth both cheers and tears, the whole §YAmphitheater§! is their stage and responsibility.
translation: 伴随着震耳的声音，竞技大师可以挑动出欢呼和眼泪，整个§Y圆形剧场§!都是他们的舞台和责任所在。

original: Unlocks the §YMaster of the Games§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y竞技大师§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person with a strong personality and presence, capable of bending a whole crowd to their will.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位拥有强大人格和存在感，有能力使整个人群服从他们意志的人物。

original: With nerves of steel and a will of iron the custodian maintains and develops the §YRoyal Palace§!.
translation: 看管人以钢铁般坚定地意志维护和兴修§Y王宫§!。
解锁§Y王宫管理人§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has proven themselves dependable, and they are responsible for the upkeep and maintenance of the §YRoyal Palace§!.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位可靠的人物——负责§Y王宫§!的维护与保养。

original: Responsible for everything inside the §YUniversity's§! walls, this title brings with it both gravitas and responsibility.
translation: 负责§Y大学§!院墙内的所有事务，这个头衔担负着庄严与责任。

original: Unlocks the §YGuardian of Knowledge§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y知识卫士§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown their wisdom and courage.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出其智慧和勇气的人物。

original: From old ledgers covered in dust to newly minted pages – all written text needs someone to care for it.
translation: 从布满灰尘的旧账本到崭新的书页——所有文本都需要有人来打理。

original: Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Tomes§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y卷宗看护者§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown great aptitude for learning and all related skills.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出巨大的学习天赋及其相关技能的人物。

original: Appointed as the one responsible for the eternal rest of the dead in the mausoleum is the Keeper of the Dead.
translation: 守陵人被指派了保卫陵墓中死者的长眠的职责。

original: Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Dead§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y守墓人§!的荣誉头衔

original: The Keeper of the Dead is responsible for the final rest of everyone placed in the §YMausoleum§!.
translation: 守陵人负责守护§Y陵墓§!中每一位安息的死者。

original: Appointed as the one with ultimate authority over all rites executed within the pyramid's walls the Overseer of Rites carry both authority and responsibility upon their shoulders.
translation: 仪式监察官受任命成为金字塔内举行的所有仪式的终极权威，肩负着威信和责任。

original: Unlocks the §YOverseer of the Rites§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y仪式监察官§!的荣誉头衔

original: The Overseer of Rites is responsible for all rites and rituals related to the §YPyramid§!.
translation: 仪式监察官负责所有与§Y金字塔§!有关的仪式和典礼。

original: As the authority on all daily business and rituals, the Custodian of the Mosque is heeded by all.
translation: 作为一切日常事务和仪式的权威，清真寺看管人让所有人言听计从。

original: Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Mosque§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y清真寺看管人§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经为[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]做出杰出贡献的人物。

original: As the authority on all daily business and rituals the Custodian of the Temple is heeded by all.
translation: 作为一切日常事务和仪式的权威，神庙看管人让所有人言听计从。

original: Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Temple§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y神庙看管人§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经为[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]做出杰出贡献的人物。

original:
[target_vassal.GetTitledName], I want to express my admiration and satisfaction in your handling of the [target_wonder.GetName]!

Sincerely,
[target_liege.GetBestName]
translation:
[target_vassal.GetTitledName]，你能解决[target_wonder.GetName]的问题我非常满意，我想向你表达我的钦佩！

诚挚地，
[target_liege.GetBestName]

original: It's all due to your guidance, my liege.
translation: 全是您领导有方，我的领主。

original: I have done good, haven't I!
translation: 我就说我干得很棒，对吧！

original:
My liege, the [target_wonder.GetName] is bringing prosperity and fame to the area, and I am grateful that you entrusted such a magnificent structure to my province.

Sincerely,
[target_vassal.GetBestName]
translation:
我的领主，[target_wonder.GetName]为这片区域带来了繁荣和声望，您能把这么宏伟的建筑托付与我省，我分外感激。

诚挚地，
[target_vassal.GetBestName]

original: A piece of the [target_wonder.GetName] has fallen off – almost hitting a bystander in the head! Certain areas of the magnificent structure seem to be in dire need of upkeep.
translation: [target_wonder.GetName]的一块碎片坠落了下来——几乎砸中了一位旁观者的头！这座宏伟建筑的某些区域似乎急需维护。

original: Repairs will be started at once!
Hm, I bet these pieces would fetch a decent price...
translation: 嗯，这些碎片八成能卖个好价钱……

original: This honorific is awarded to a vassal that is held in high regard by their liege. As Castellan they are responsible for the maintenance and daily ongoings of the Fortress.
translation: 这个称号被授予领主所敬重的封臣。堡主负责城堡的维护和日常运转。

original: A courtier named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.
translation: 一位名为§Y$NAME$§!的廷臣出现在§Y$EMPLOYER$§!的宫廷。

original: A courtier named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.
translation: 一位名为§Y$NAME$§!的廷臣出现在§Y$EMPLOYER$§!的宫廷。
更快地将§G省份§!转变为你的§G文化§!

original: The soothing sounds of the [target_wonder.GetName] embrace me as I walk through the greenery. Reportedly some local herbs have sprouted in the garden, but a secluded patch of grass present an alternative end to this excursion.
translation: 我走过[target_wonder.GetName]的温室，令人镇静的声音环绕着我。据报花园里栽种的本地药草已经发芽，而一处与世隔绝的草丛则给我这次游览的结果提供了一种不同的可能性……

original: A restful nap is exactly what I need!
translation: 我要好好打个盹休息休息！

original: The temple is a holy building, a place of devotion and reflection.
translation: 寺庙是神圣的场所，是敬拜神明之处，是沉思之处。

original: Built to symbolize different aspects of Buddhist theology.
translation: 为象征佛教理论的不同方面而建造。

original: Built to gain spiritual benefits, or to commemorate visits.
translation: 为获得精神上的裨益或纪行而建造。

original: A higher chance of escaping capture after battle
translation: 一场战役后有更高的机会逃离抓捕

original: The construction of all Great Works within the realm of $OWNER|Y$ has been halted.
translation: $OWNER|Y$领地内所有奇观的建造工作都暂停了。

original: The construction of stage $STAGE|Y$ has finished for the $WONDER|Y$

translation: 奇观附属建筑建设完成

original: The construction of the feature $UPGRADE|Y$ has finished for the $WONDER|Y$
Shows what has happened to this Great Work since the start of the campaign.
translation: 显示自建成以来，这座奇观经历的历史。
没有正在进行的建筑项目

original: As I retired to my [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber], I was shocked to find a copy of [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] of [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith on my bed! At first, I thought someone had left it there with the intention to frame me, but then I noticed a little note left on top of the open tome. 'I think you will find this interesting. Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.
translation: 当我回到我的[secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber]，我惊奇地发现一份[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的[secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]躺在我的床上！一开始，我以为是什么人留在那里准备用来诬陷我的，但之后我注意到有一张小便条留在这本打开的大部头书上。「我觉得你会在其中发现有趣的东西的。请给这本书一个机会。落款：一位朋友。」

original: It would take $TIME|Y$ to build this feature. If construction starts now, estimated completion date is $ESTIMATED_FINISH_DATE|Y$.
translation: 建造这个附属建筑将花费$TIME|Y$。如果建设现在开始，预计完成时间为$ESTIMATED_FINISH_DATE|Y$。

original: It would take $TIME|Y$ to build the first stage of this great work. If construction starts now, estimated completion date is $ESTIMATED_FINISH_DATE|Y$.
translation: 该奇观的第一期工程将耗费$TIME|Y$。如果现在开始建设，预计将于$ESTIMATED_FINISH_DATE|Y$完成建设。

original: Construction cost will be $TICKING_COST|R$¤per month for $TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$ reaching an estimated total cost of $ESTIMATED_TOTAL|R$¤.
translation: 奇观建设历时$TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$，每月将会耗费$TICKING_COST|R$¤，统共$ESTIMATED_TOTAL|R$¤。

original: $FLAT_COST|R$¤will be deducted from $OWNER|Y$ upon construction start.
translation: 奇观建设开始后将会扣除$OWNER|Y$$FLAT_COST|R$¤

translation: §G点击左键使省份在屏幕上居中§!

original: Great Work will cost $FLAT_COST|R$¤to build and $TICKING_COST|R$¤per month during construction. It will take $TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$ to build.\n$ALLOW_TRIGGER$
translation: 建造奇观需要一次性投入$FLAT_COST|R$¤，在建造期间每月还需花费$TICKING_COST|R$¤。建设需要$TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$。\n$ALLOW_TRIGGER$

original: §RYou can not resume construction if you are bankrupt§!
translation: §R如果你破产了你就不能重新开始建造§!

original: Rulers are allowed to construct Great Works.
Rulers are NOT allowed to construct Great Works.
Historical Great Works will exist, but rulers are not allowed to change them in any way.
translation: 将存在史实奇观，但是统治者无法以各种方式改造它们。

original: §Y$CHARACTER$§! participated in the construction of the §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!
Start looting the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!.\nThis can yield treasures but will also cause damage and render the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§! unusable until it has been restored.
translation: 开始劫掠§Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!。\n这样做可以获得财宝，但也会造成损坏，使得§Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!被修复前都将无法发挥作用。

original: Abandon all looting progress and cause no further damage to the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!.
translation: 放弃所有劫掠进度，不再对§Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!造成进一步的损害。

original: Start restoring the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§! to its former glory!\nRestoration will cost §R$FLAT_COST$§!¤to initiate and $TICKING_COST|R$¤per month until it is completed.\nIt will take $TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$ to finish restoration and once completed, the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§! will be at stage §Y[FromFrom.GetCurrentStageNumber]§!.
translation: 开始修复§Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!，让其焕发往日的荣光！\n发起修复需要花费§R$FLAT_COST$§!¤，直到完成每月还需投入$TICKING_COST|R$¤。\n完成修复需要$TIME_TO_BUILD|Y$，一旦完成，§Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!将会处于第§Y[FromFrom.GetCurrentStageNumber]§!阶段。

original: Abandon all restoration progress for the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!.
While restoration is paused there is no restoration upkeep.
translation: 暂停修复时不消耗每月修复费用

original: While stage construction is paused there is no stage construction upkeep.
translation: 暂停阶段建设时不消耗每月建设费用。

original: §RYou can not resume restoration if you are bankrupt§!
translation: §R如果你破产了你就不能重新开始修复§!

translation: 对第$STAGE|Y$阶段$WONDER|Y$的劫掠已完成了

Are you sure you want to abort restoration of the §Y[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShort]§!?\n\nNo gold will be refunded for this action

The Great Work is at its final stage
The Great Work is NOT at its final stage
A Great Work should not be without protection. Let us recruit a force to protect it, and maybe it can be useful also for other missions.
translation: 奇观不能没人保护。我们应该招点人来守护它，或许他们还能在别的任务中发挥作用……
直辖内任意奇观附属建筑

original: These constructions are not for the faint of heart. Decades will pass, and heaps of gold will be spent, but at the end of it all you might be left with one of the greatest buildings in the world...
translation: 这些工程并不是为胸无大志之人准备。它们将消耗数十年的光阴以及成堆的黄金，但是最终，你将收获世界上最伟大的建筑之一……

original: Pyramids were built many years ago by the ancients, we too should aspire to such lofty heights.
translation: 金字塔很久很久以前由古人所建，我们也应当追求如它一般的高度。

original: §GIndependent lieges of this religion can construct pyramids§!
translation: §G此宗教的独立领主可以建造金字塔§!

original: By some complex machinery this throne can raise itself up and down at will.
translation: 通过一些复杂的机械装置，这个宝座现在可以自如的上下移动。

original: A place for the nobility to meet, dance and scheme at feasts
translation: 贵族们在宴会中会面、跳舞和密谋的地方

original: We should hold it in the Grand Amphitheater!
translation: 我们应该把它放在大圆形剧场里！

original: This option is available as you own a §YGrand Amphitheater§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有一座§Y大圆形剧场§!。

original: This option is available as you own the §YAnimal Cages§! feature
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有一座§Y兽笼§!。

original: Enables the use of §YDangerous Animals§Y in the Arena
translation: 允许在竞技场中使用§Y危险的动物§Y

original: This great work has taken damage from an earthquake and has not been repaired.
translation: 奇观在一场地震中受损，目前还未被修复。

original: This great work has taken damage from an earthquake and has not been repaired.
translation: 奇观在一场地震中受损，目前还未被修复。

original: This great work has taken damage from an earthquake and has not been repaired.
translation: 奇观在一场地震中受损，目前还未被修复。

original: You will set aside funds to repair the damage on the lighthouse removing the negative features.
translation: 你会拨款修复灯塔的损坏，去除负面特征。

original: This temple was built in the form of a giant ornamented chariot dedicated to the Sun God, Surya.
translation: 这座神庙被设计成太阳神苏利耶战车的形状。

original: The great desert city of Petra has existed for hundreds of years
translation: 佩特拉沙漠古城已经存在了数个世纪之久

original: A grand library, housing much of the world's knowledge.
translation: 一座大图书馆，世间万物之理皆藏于馆中。

original: The palace of the Pope himself, sitting at the heart of Rome.
translation: 教宗本人的宫殿，坐落于罗马的心脏地带。

original: A grand statue of a majestic stallion!
translation: 一匹雄伟种马的大雕像

original: To some a simple metal chair, but to this ruler so much more.
translation: 对某些人来说这是一把普通的金属椅子，但对这位统治者来说它具有深刻含义。

original: Great Work is NOT being looted
Only the independent ruler of the realm is allowed to loot Great Works
translation: 只有国内的独立统治者才能劫掠奇观

original: Only Great Works that has completed stage $STAGE_NUMBER|Y$ can be looted
translation: 只有已经完成了阶段$STAGE_NUMBER|Y$的奇观才能被劫掠。

original: Only the independent ruler of the realm is allowed to restore Great Works
translation: 只有国内的独立统治者才能修复奇观

original: The up front cost of $COST$¤cannot be paid
A sacred and reserved space inside the temple where only the high ranking priests can enter.
translation: 神庙内预留出的神圣空间，唯有高阶祭司方能涉足。

original: Two pillars of bronze frame the entrance to the temple, bidding all worshipers welcome.
translation: 用两根青铜柱作门框的神殿入口，招徕信众的朝拜。

original: Cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, all overlaid with gold, are carved into the cedar-lined walls. The floor is of cypress overlaid with gold. The door posts, of olive wood, support folding doors of cypress.
translation: 铺上香柏木的殿墙上刻画着基路伯、棕树和初开的花，都贴上了金子。柏木地板也帖上了金子。橄榄木做的门柱支撑着柏木做的折叠门。

original: The inner sanctuary within the temple. It is located in the westernmost end of the temple building, a perfect cube, prepared to contain the Ark of the Covenant.
translation: 圣殿内部的圣所，位于圣殿的最西端，构造呈完美的立方形，其中存放着约柜。

original: The Inner Court, or Court of the Priests, is separated from the space beyond by a wall of three courses of hewn stone, surmounted by cedar beams. It contains the Altar of burnt-offering, the Brazen Sea laver, and ten other lavers.
translation: 内殿，又称祭司殿，与外间以三层凿出的石壁隔开，其上架着香柏木托梁。殿内有燔祭祭坛、铜海大盆和其他十个铜盆。

original: A large hall where famous scholars can give public lectures, attracting many attendees.
translation: 一间大厅，著名学者在此进行公开演讲，吸引了大量的参与者。

original: The intricate arts of negotiation, rhetoric, and ultimately convincing others of where their best interests lie are taught and practiced here.
translation: 这里教授复杂的谈判技巧和修辞学，操练如何去说服他人，晓以大利。

original: Here the classic works on history and ancient wars are taught and discussed, as well as old and new treatises on the art of warfare.
translation: 这里教授经典的历史著作，研讨古代战争，也涉及古今的兵法论著。

original: The principles of accounting, finance, and economics are taught here.
translation: 这里教授会计、财务和经济学的原理。

original: From what plants to use for making deadly concoctions to the art of cipher, all that a budding spy needs to know is taught here.
translation: 这里教授一个初出茅庐的间谍必备的知识，从使用植物制作致死药剂到密码的技艺。

original: Here the foundations of logic and mathematics are taught, as well as physics, metaphysics, and the scriptures.
translation: 这里教授逻辑和数学的基础，同时也教授物理学、形而上学以及宗教经典。

original: splendid [This.GetName] draw[This.GetSingularS] a lot of attention
translation: 壮丽的[This.GetName]吸引了很多人的注意
最近被送过酒水类礼物
改革尊日神教信徒好感

original: Improved Buildings for Cities and Temples
Better Equipment and Discipline for the Infantry
translation: 给步兵提供更好的装备和训练。

original: Better Equipment and Discipline for the Cavalry
translation: 给骑兵提供更好的装备和训练。
提高散兵战部队的训练水平
提高肉搏战部队的训练水平

original: The chance of Flank leaders choosing better skirmisher tactics increases
translation: 提升侧翼将领触发更好的散兵战战术的几率

original: The chance of Flank leaders choosing better melee tactics increases
translation: 提升侧翼将领触发更好的肉搏战战术的几率

original: The Ruler has given signs of Religious Tolerance to the population.
translation: 统治者向人民表现出了宗教宽容的态度。

original: Could not control the own troops.
Does not tolerate indiscipline in the army.
translation: 不能容忍军队的无纪律。

original: and is the seat of the Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople
translation: 同时也是普世牧首的所在地

original: and was converted to the Latin cult after the conquest of Constantinople
translation: 在君士坦丁堡被征服后被改建为拉丁宗派教堂

original: and was converted to be the Imperial Mosque after the conquest of Constantinople
translation: 在君士坦丁堡被征服后被改建为帝国清真寺

original: and is the pride of Constantinople

My [target_chaplain.GetJobTitle] [target_chaplain.GetFirstName] wants to convert [target_wonder.GetName] to the true faith as soon as possible, so that our people can worship in the grandiose building.
translation: 我的[target_chaplain.GetJobTitle][target_chaplain.GetFirstName]希望能尽快改建[target_wonder.GetName]，使它适应真信，这样我们的人民就能在这座浮夸的建筑物中做礼拜。

original: Some of my followers are clamoring for the conversion of [target_wonder.GetName] to the true faith as soon as possible, so that our people can worship in the grandiose building.
translation: 我的一些追随者们大声嚷着应该尽快改建[target_wonder.GetName]，使它适应真信，这样我们的人民就能在这座浮夸的建筑中做礼拜。

original: Yes, we should convert it to the true [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 是的，我们应该改建它，使它为真信[Root.Religion.GetName]服务。

original: No, we should let it be.
translation: 不，我们让它就这么保持原样。

original: Things quickly get out of control as my soldiers storm the gates of [From.GetName]. Killing indiscriminately and sacking every building they come across, they seem to have lost all sense of discipline.
translation: 当我的士兵攻入[From.GetName]的大门时，事态迅速变得失控了。他们肆意杀戮，洗劫每一座碰见的建筑，他们似乎丧失所有纪律。

original: After the army enters [From.GetName], any sense of discipline is lost and the men start to rob, burn and pillage.
translation: 在大军进入[From.GetName]后，纪律荡然无存，士兵们开始了烧杀抢掠。

original: Let them have their fun. This is war after all.
translation: 让他们乐一下吧。毕竟这就是战争。

original: I will stop this immediately and hang the culprits!
translation: 我会立即阻止此事，绞死罪犯！

original: This action will be considered dishonorable by many people.
translation: 这个行为让很多人不齿。

original: You manage to regain control of the army.
translation: 你设法重新控制了军队。

original: You are unable to stop the killing and destruction.
translation: 你无法阻止杀戮和破坏。
启用角色间的§Y私密谈话§!

original: Can be used to store a §YRelic§!
translation: 可以用于保存一件§Y圣物§!

original: The house of the Gods, an Aztec Pyramid is the holy place where messengers can be sent to the Them, by decapitating the victims' heads.
translation: 阿兹特克金字塔是一座神庙，一处圣地。人们在里面斩下信使的头颅，这样他就能被送到神明那里去。

original: King Henry of England is Dead!

Henry I just died without a male heir. You, together with the other nobles of the realm promised to accept his daughter Matilda as queen. But not all are happy with having a woman sitting on the English Throne. As a nephew of the late king, if you depart immediately to London you can claim the throne for yourself. Or, you can let Matilda know that she has your support.
translation: 亨利一世去世了，他没有留下一位男性继承人，你和国内的其他贵族许诺接受他的女儿·玛蒂尔达，让她成为女王。然而，并不是所有人都乐于见到一个女人坐在英格兰的王位上。作为那位已至晚年的国王的外甥，如果你立刻启程前往伦敦，你就能为自己宣称这个王位。或者，你也可以让玛蒂尔达知道，你支持她。

original: Let Matilda know that [Root.GetTitledName] is a man of his word.
translation: 告诉玛蒂尔达，[Root.GetTitledName]说话算数。

original: Only a fool would let this opportunity pass. I want to be King!
translation: 只有蠢材才会让机会白白溜走。我想做国王！

original: Your father, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], just died without a male heir. A few years prior, he made his nobles promise to support you and your oldest son as his only living legitimate heirs. Granted, not all are happy having a woman sitting on the English Throne, but your cousin, the powerful [From.GetTitledName], announced [From.GetHerHis] support to your claim, followed by most of the nobility.
translation: 你的父亲，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]刚刚去世，没有留下一位男性继承人。几年前，他让手下的贵族们许诺，支持他在世的唯一的合法继承人，你与你的长子。自然，并不是所有人都乐于见到一个女人坐在英格兰的王位上。然而，你强有力的表哥，[From.GetTitledName]宣布[From.GetHeShe]将效忠于你，多数贵族也持同样的意见。

original: I will thus assume the mantle of my father.
translation: 因此，我将继承我父亲的衣钵。

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] just died without a male heir. The nobles of the realm, keeping an oath given to the king, have accepted his only living legitimate heir, [From.GetName], as Queen. It is likely to also strengthen her husband, [matilda_spouse.GetTitledName], and upset the balance of power in France.
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]刚刚去世，他没有留下一位男性继承人。国内的贵族们遵守他们对国王发的誓言，接受了他在世的唯一一位合法继承人，[From.GetName]，为女王。这可能也会增强她丈夫[matilda_spouse.GetTitledName]的实力，并且破坏法国的权力平衡。

original: Your father, [FromFrom.GetTitledName] just died without a male heir. A few years prior, he made his nobles promise to support you and your oldest son, as his only living legitimate heirs. However, not all were happy to have a woman sit on the English Throne – your cousin, the powerful [From.GetTitledName], took to England and in claiming the Kingdom for himself, usurped your rights, and was accepted by most of the nobility in the process.
translation: 你的父亲，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]刚刚去世，没有留下一位男性继承人。几年前，他让手下的贵族们许诺，支持他在世的唯一的合法继承人，你与你的长子。然而，并不是所有人都乐于见到一个女人坐在英格兰的王位上。——你的表哥，强有力的[From.GetTitledName]，启程前往英格兰，为他自己宣称这个王国，篡夺了你的继承权，并且在此过程中赢得了多数贵族的支持。

original: I will fight for the throne of my father.
translation: 我将为我父亲的王位而战

original: Your father in law, [FromFrom.GetTitledName] just died without a male heir. A few years prior, he made his nobles promise to support your wife [matilda.GetFirstName] and your oldest son as his only living legitimate heirs. But not all are happy having a woman on the English Throne, and [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s nephew [From.GetFirstName] has come to England, claiming the Kingdom for himself and usurping your rights in the process. Most of the English nobles seem ready to recognize his illegitimate claim, but perhaps decisive action could change things.
translation: 你的岳父，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]刚刚去世，没有留下一位男性继承人。几年前，他让手下的贵族们许诺，支持他在世的唯一的合法继承人，你的妻子[matilda.GetFirstName]与你的长子。然而，并不是所有人都乐于见到一个女人坐在英格兰的王位上。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的外甥[From.GetFirstName]，一启程前往英格兰，为他自己宣称这个王国，并在此过程中篡夺了你们的继承权。大多数英格兰贵族似乎已准备好承认他非法的宣称，然而，或许一个决定性的行为将使这发生改变。

original: I will fight for the rights of my wife!
translation: 我将为妻子的权利而战！

original: This is not a good time. Let's wait and see.
translation: 时机还不成熟。我们走着瞧。

original: I have received word from a jailer who has been caring for my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Not only is the [From.GetGirlWomanBoyMan] locked away in a dark cell - [From.GetSheHe] is now suffering from [From.GetScriptedDiseaseName].
translation: 一个一直在看押我[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]的狱卒向我来报。那个[From.GetGirlWomanBoyMan]不仅被锁在昏暗无光的牢笼里——[From.GetSheHe]现在还饱受着[From.GetScriptedDiseaseName]的病痛。

original: Guards! It is time we release my poor [GetFromRelation] from prison.
translation: 卫兵！该把我可怜的[GetFromRelation]从牢里放出来了，

original: Was Sent Away From Crowded Court
translation: 被从人数过多的宫廷中「请」走
是一名§Y摄政§!，§Y指定摄政§!，§Y指挥官§!，或§Y宫廷医师§!

original: Is your spouse, close family, or your consort
translation: 是你的配偶, 近亲, 或者妾侍/庶夫

original: Is an important character in an ongoing chain of events
translation: 是一个正在进行的事件链中的重要角色

original: Is in Hiding, out traveling, or otherwise occupied with important business\n
translation: 正在藏匿、外出旅行，或在其他重要事务中脱不开身\n

original: The spouse of [Prev.GetTitledFirstName] must also be allowed to leave
[invited_character.GetFullName] has arrived at your court, ready for service.
translation: [invited_character.GetFullName]已经抵达您的宫廷，为您服务。

original: The [target_upgrade.GetName] prove[target_upgrade.GetSingularS] a perfect hide away for lovers like you...
translation: [target_upgrade.GetName]成功地在像你这样的追求者面前隐藏了[target_upgrade.GetSingularS]。

original: The [target_upgrade.GetName] prove[target_upgrade.GetSingularS] a perfect hide away for new lovers.
translation: [target_upgrade.GetName]成功地在新的追求者面前隐藏了[target_upgrade.GetSingularS]。

original: Your [target_character.GetRootRelation] will probably not take this well.
I am not looking for anything 'serious', my [From.GetLordLady].
translation: 我的[From.GetLordLady]，其实我并没有打算要来「真」的。

original: [target_character.GetFirstName] returned my kiss, and more. "When will I see you again?" I asked, as we were parting. The [From.GetManWoman] chuckled, and said that this was fun, but that is all it was.
translation: [target_character.GetFirstName]更加热烈地回应了我的吻。当我们将要分开时，我问道：「我们下次见面是什么时候？」[From.GetManWoman]轻声笑道：「刚才只是一个玩笑，我们到此为止了。」

original: [target_character.GetFirstName] returned my kiss, and more. Afterwards, we talked for hours, and I found myself fascinated by [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetLoverEnjoyableQuirk]. As we part, my heart is singing with [From.GetHerHis] name and I cannot wait until I can see [From.GetHerHim] again. I must learn everything about [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: [target_character.GetFirstName]更加热烈地回应了我的吻。后来我们聊了很长时间，我发现我已经被[From.GetHerHis][From.GetLoverEnjoyableQuirk]给迷住了。当我们将要分别时，我的内心已写满了[From.GetHerHis]名字并为此狂喜，我已经等不及再见到[From.GetHerHim]了。我必须要了解关于[From.GetHerHim]的一切！

original: always way of seeing the best in people
translation: 总是能发现一个人最好的点

original: I have decided to show my devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] and the order by taking a vow of celibacy.
translation: 我立誓独身以向[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]和修会展现我的奉献精神。

original: The most essential goals of the Assassins is to protect the believers of the True Faith and spread the words of [shiite.GetHighGodName] to every corner of the Earth. While even the most remote lands shall be converted one day, first we must turn to places closer to home — your mission is to convert the county [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 对于阿萨辛来说最重要的目标就是保护拥有正信的信徒，并将[shiite.GetHighGodName]的话传遍世界上的每一个角落。总有一天即使是最偏远的土地也会皈依，但首先我们必须从距离我们较近的目标开始——你的任务是让[FromFrom.GetName]皈依。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time is nigh for the people in [conversion_province.GetName] to adopt the true religion. When a majority of the population in the county has converted to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, your mission is complete.

Praised be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候让[conversion_province.GetName]的百姓接受正信了。当省份中大多数人皈依[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰时，你的任务就完成了。

赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: The people of the county [conversion_province.GetName] has now fully embraced [Root.Religion.GetName] as their religion. From [conversion_province.Capital.GetHolding] to countryside, the names of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] and the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are honored and cherished. Your mission is complete.
translation: [conversion_province.GetName]的人民已经接受了[Root.Religion.GetName]作为他们的信仰。从[conversion_province.Capital.GetHolding]到乡村，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]和[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们的名字被纪念和爱戴。你的任务完成了。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are constantly pestering me about religion and [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. No matter what I do, promise to pray more or read the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] more thoroughly, they won't leave me alone!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]经常因为宗教和[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]等问题纠缠我。无论我做什么，即便我答应更多地祈祷或更彻底地阅读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，他们也不肯轻易放过我！

original: Last night I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], the narrow-minded [From.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...
translation: 昨晚我在一场宴会上找了个机会和[From.GetTitledFirstName]攀谈起来，以此了解[From.GetSheHe]有多大的可能会被说服而皈依正信。不幸的是，当我聊起[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]和[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]时，这个偏执的[From.GetManWoman]变得相当暴躁……

original: We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [From.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [From.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if They will it, get killed to defend the words of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]?"
translation: 我们沉默了片刻，似乎都在考量这些忠诚的灵魂。然后[From.GetFirstName]抬头看着我，[From.GetHerHis]眼神中充满了好奇。「那倒不是一个不可能的愿望，[Root.GetFirstName]。你是否做好杀人的准备，或者依照祂们的旨意，为了捍卫[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]和[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的话语而牺牲？」

original: "I do, [Root.GetFirstName]," says [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an Order devoted to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]. One that defends those true of faith and bring vengeance to their persecutors. The Assassins are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."
translation: 「是的，[Root.GetFirstName]，」[From.GetTitledFirstName]用庄严，几乎是仪式性的语气说。「有一个为[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]效力的教团。他们保护真正的信徒，并向迫害者复仇。阿萨辛需要人才。好好考虑一下，有人会联系你的……」

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

For far too long, the gentle people of [shiite_province.GetName] has suffered under the cruel rule of [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]. It is your sacred duty to end [assassins_target.GetHerHim] and liberate our people. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

很久以来，[shiite_province.GetName]温和的人民饱受着[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]的残暴统治。你的神圣使命就是铲除[assassins_target.GetHerHim]，解放我们的人民。让[assassins_target.GetHerHim]的死给敌人一个教训，使他们心中充满恐惧。.

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] and convert to the religion of [Root.Religion.GetName].
"My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with excitement in [courtier.GetHerHis] eyes. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]靠近我说道，[courtier.GetHerHis]眼中带着兴奋。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with an armful of scrolls. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]抱着一捆卷轴靠近我说道。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with clothes stained with dirt and fire in [courtier.GetHerHis] eyes. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]穿着满身污渍的衣服，[courtier.GetHerHis]眼里冒着火，靠近我说道。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] emerges from a gathering of courtiers and makes [courtier.GetHerHis] way over to me. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]从一堆廷臣中挤出一条[courtier.GetHerHis]路来走向我。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with a large ledger clutched in [courtier.GetHerHis] ink-stained hands. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]用[courtier.GetHerHis]沾满墨迹的手紧握着一本大帐本，靠近我说道。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady]!" [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] steps out of the shadows beside me with a sharp smile. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」[courtier.GetTitledFirstName]从我身边的阴影中走出，笑容尖刻地说道。「您能赏光授予我一个称号吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」

original: Oh, you'll get a nickname alright!
translation: 噢，你很快就会有个称号了！

original: I have more important things to do.
translation: 我还有更重要的事去做。

original: A group of courtiers approach me, most of whom I barely even recognize.\n\n"We are taking our leave, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Do we go with your blessing?"
translation: 一伙廷臣找到了我，他们中大多数我几乎都认不出名。\n\n「[Root.GetLordLady]，我们已经准备离开您的宫廷了，您能为我们许下祝愿吗？」

original: Yes. May you find luck elsewhere!
translation: 当然，祝你们另觅高就，一路顺风！

original: No, I have changed my mind.

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has hired an incredibly annoying [annoying_courtier.GetManWoman] to serve us. [annoying_courtier.GetHerHisCap] rudeness knows no limits, and I have no idea how to handle [annoying_courtier.GetHerHim]. [annoying_courtier.GetSheHeCap] does not know [annoying_courtier.GetHerHis] place.
translation: 我的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]聘请了一个非常烦人的[annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]来服侍我们。[annoying_courtier.GetHerHisCap]粗鲁无比，我也不知道如何应付[annoying_courtier.GetHerHim]。[annoying_courtier.GetSheHeCap]根本不知道[annoying_courtier.GetHerHis]身份是什么。

original: My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has asked me to get rid of one of my courtiers whom she finds mighty annoying. On one hand, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] might not be happy if I refuse her request, but if I fire 'the annoying [annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]' maybe people will feel my wife has too much influence over my actions.
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]要求我开除我的一个廷臣，她觉得这家伙无比烦人。一方面，如果我拒绝了她的请求，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]可能会不高兴；但是如果我开除了这个「恼人的[annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]」，人们或许会觉得我是一个对老婆言听计从的人。

original: Apparently, one of the courtiers has been annoying my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and instead of asking me for help she took the matter in her own hands and made sure the courtier would never annoy her again or [annoying_courtier.GetSheHe] would know the consequences.
translation: 显然，一个廷臣惹恼了我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，而且我的妻子并未因此而向我寻求帮助，而是亲手解决了此事。她并确保了这个廷臣再也不敢惹恼她，否则[annoying_courtier.GetSheHe]将自食其果。

original: I'll do my best to ignore [annoying_courtier.GetHerHim] and trust my husbands decision.
translation: 我会尽可能地无视[annoying_courtier.GetHerHim]并且相信我丈夫的决定。
如果可能的话，我会解雇[annoying_courtier.GetHerHim]。

original: I ask my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] to fire the annoying [annoying_courtier.GetManWoman].
translation: 我要求我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]赶走这个恼人的[annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]。

original: I have the [annoying_courtier.GetManWoman] punished for [annoying_courtier.GetHerHis] insolence.
translation: 我让这个[annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]因为[annoying_courtier.GetHerHis]傲慢无礼而受到惩罚

original: The young [annoying_courtier.GetManWoman] I pushed into the river ended up drowning. Although it was an accident rumors of my deed spread quickly.
translation: 我推入河中的年轻[annoying_courtier.GetManWoman]最终淹死了。虽然这是个意外，但说我是故意的谣言迅速蔓延。

original: Wet, but otherwise unharmed, the courtier blasted me with foul words and angry but empty threats. Seeing [annoying_courtier.GetHerHim] standing before me dripping mud and with algae entwined into [annoying_courtier.GetHerHis] hair, I could not stop the laughter pouring out of me.
translation: 这个廷臣全身湿透，但是没有受伤，还用脏话骂我，但对我来说都是愤怒而空洞的威胁。看到[annoying_courtier.GetHerHim]站在我面前满身泥沙，[annoying_courtier.GetHerHis]头发缠绕着海藻，我忍不住笑出了声。
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! 必须拥有一个满员的宫廷

original: Has NOT asked courtiers to leave recently
translation: 最近没有要求廷臣离开

original: Your court is feeling very crowded. With a small monetary encouragement some of the less influential courtiers could be encouraged to leave court.
translation: 你的宫廷拥挤不堪。你可以用一些钱打发一些影响力甚微的廷臣离开宫廷。

original: Does NOT have a full court
The Great Work is damaged and becomes unusable.\n
The Great Work is restored to its former glory.\n
translation: 奇观重建，再现往日荣光。\n

original: By many deemed integral to the silhouette of Paris, this grand Cathedral reminds the proud metropolitans of their heritage and accomplishments, while also inspiring hope for future endeavors.
translation: 这座大教堂被许多人视为巴黎的轮廓中不可或缺的一部分，让自豪的都市人回想起了他们的文化遗产和文化成就，同时也激发了人们对将来奋斗的期望。

original: Is an important character or a character in an ongoing chain of events
translation: 是一个重要角色或处于正在进行的事件链中的角色

original: Is NOT an important character or a character in an ongoing chain of events
translation: 不是一个重要角色或处于正在进行的事件链中的角色

original: Is NOT an important character to $CHAR|Y$
translation: 对于$CHAR|Y$不是一个重要角色

original: [antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName] has secluded [antagonize_target.GetHerselfHimself] with the rest of the court in [antagonize_target.Location.GetName], presumably biding their time while disease lingers in the countryside of the realm. "It will not be possible to reach [antagonize_target.GetHerHim] for some time", my council informs me.
translation: 在病魔徘徊在领地的乡村之际，[antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName][antagonize_target.GetHerselfHimself]已经和[antagonize_target.Location.GetName]宫廷中其他人一起进入隔离等待时机。「这段时间不可能联系得到[antagonize_target.GetHerHim]了。」我的内阁告诉我。

original: As I have gone into seclusion with my court, my efforts to antagonize [antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName] will have to be halted.
translation: 由于我已经与我的宫廷一同进入隔离，我必须停止激怒[antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName]的努力。

original: As both [antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I are both currently weathering the disease ravaging the countryside outside, my efforts to antagonize [antagonize_target.GetHerHim] will have to be put on hold...
translation: 由于[antagonize_target.GetTitledFirstName]和我现在都在等待肆虐外面乡村的病魔消退，我激怒[antagonize_target.GetHerHim]的努力将不得不搁置……

original: No historical Great Works will exist.

After a long council meeting, my head is filled with the latest expense reports. I let out a sigh, a small feeling of defeat building in me, but [upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName] interrupts my thoughts: "I don't know if it matters to you, my [Root.GetLordLady], but many are grateful for the way you are handling the surplus of men and women here in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]."
translation: 一次漫长的议会会议后，我满脑子都是最新的开支报告。我叹了口气，心里有一种小小的挫败感，但[upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName]打断了我的思绪：「我不知道你是否在乎，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，但很多人都很感激你处理[Root.GetCapitalHolding]过剩的人员的方式。」

original: At the end of supper, [upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] calls me over to [upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis] table, pointing at a tall glass of [Root.GetAlcohol]. "There are many of us who want to personally thank you for your hospitality, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I know space is hard to come by inside the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]." The [upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman] presses my hand and smiles in gratitude.
translation: 在晚餐的最后，[upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]把我叫到[upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis]桌边，指着一个盛有[Root.GetAlcohol]的高脚杯，「我们中有许多人都想亲自感谢您的盛情款待，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。我明白在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]是很难搞到一席之地的。」这个[upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman]紧握着我的手，露出了感激的微笑。

original: During supper, my [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation] [upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] stands up and clears [upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis] throat. "My [Root.GetLordLady], there are many of us who want to thank you for your hospitality, in these trying times. It is not all who would find lodgings for as many as you have managed to, [Root.GetMasterMistress]."
translation: 晚餐的时候，我的[upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation][upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]起身清了清[upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis]嗓子，「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，在这个艰难的时期，我们中有许多人都很感激您的热情款待。并非所有人都能为你找到这么多的栖身之所，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。」

original: Aaw, but I actually like sleeping out in the stables sometimes!
translation: 哦，不过有时候我真的喜欢睡在马厩里!

original: Aaah, but there is strength in numbers, my [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation].
I simply enjoy everyone's company, dear [upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我只是喜欢和大家在一起，亲爱的[upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName]！

original: More people means more resources for... Anything we might require.
translation: 更多的人意味着消耗更多的资源……这些都是我们可能需要的东西。

original: A toast to you, my good [upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman]! You are all important to me.
translation: 敬你们一杯，我的好[upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman]！你们对我都很重要。

original: Oh, [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation]. You are all important to me, is all.
translation: 哦，[upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation]。你们对我都很重要，就是这样。

original: This character is known for [Root.GetHerHis] hospitality.
translation: 该角色以[Root.GetHerHis]热情好客闻名于世。

original: This character is known for inspiring loyalty amongst [Root.GetHerHis] courtiers.
translation: 该角色因鼓舞了[Root.GetHerHis]廷臣的忠诚闻名于世。

original: This character is known for [Root.GetHerHis] pragmatic approach to human resources.
translation: 该角色以[Root.GetHerHis]对人力资源的务实态度闻名于世。

original: This character is known for being the most welcoming host in the realm.
translation: 该角色被认为是国内最好客的东道主。

original: The number of courtiers allowed in each court is limited.
translation: 每个宫廷的廷臣数量将受到限制。

original: The number of courtiers allowed in each court is unlimited, and events tied to the mechanic are disabled.
translation: 每个宫廷的廷臣数量将不会受到限制，同时禁用与这项机制绑定的事件。

original: gains the trait '§YBaptized by the Patriarch§!'

I try to walk the path to eternal life that [eternal_life_mystic.GetBestName] set me on without her help, but I am blind without her guidance. I cannot do anything but chuckle, my path to immortality has been severed by death caused by my own two hands – the irony!
translation: 在不依赖[eternal_life_mystic.GetBestName]的帮助之下，我尝试在她为我指引的永生之路上艰难前行，但缺乏她的引导使我进退维谷。我无能为力，唯有哑然失笑，在我亲手造成的死亡之下，永恒之道也已断绝——何其讽刺！

original: As if fate is playing a cruel joke on me my guide to eternal life, [eternal_life_mystic.GetBestName], has passed on. Alone I try to walk the path she set me on, but without her helping hand I fumble in the dark... Is the path to immortality forever hidden from me now?
translation: 好像命运给我开了一残忍的玩笑，我的永生向导[eternal_life_mystic.GetBestName]已经去世了。我尝试着独自走在她为我指引的路上，然而离开了她的帮助我仅能在黑暗中摸索前行………永恒之道是否已经永远对我关上大门？

original: Just imagine what I could have learned!
translation: 用想象补全我本来要学到的东西！

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has procured a venomous viper, and sends word that it will soon dig its fangs into [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经准备好了一条毒蛇，告诉我说它的毒牙很快便将扎进[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的身体。

original: The local player is an observer.
translation: 本地玩家处于旁观视角。

original: The local player is NOT an observer.
translation: 本地玩家未处于旁观视角。

original: On the 7th of August 936, Otto I was crowned King of the Germans. He initiated his arduous campaign to crush his rivals and reconquer the lost territory in Italy to reform the Holy Roman Empire. The Magyars settled down in the Carpathian Basin and began to make their mark on the world as they conquered and pillaged their neighbors, becoming feared across Europe. In the north the Christians were trying to push into the Scandinavian Peninsula to start converting the pagan kings, but the Germanic faith still stood strong among the vikings. In Baghdad far to the south-east, the ancient Abbasid Caliphate that once ruled an empire stretching from Persia to Hispania finally fell to infighting, left only with the heartland of their former empire. And on the shores of Africa a new rival rose up in the form of the Fatimid Caliphate, ready to fill the vacant regions left behind by their adversary.
translation: 936年8月7日，奥托一世被加冕为德意志人的国王。其后他发起了一场艰苦卓绝的战役，粉碎了他的对手，收复了意大利失去的领土，并最终重建了神圣罗马帝国。马扎尔人在喀尔巴阡盆地定居下来，并以征服与劫掠邻邦的形象，被全世界所铭记，被全欧洲所恐惧。在北方，基督教势力正向斯堪的纳维亚半岛所推进，尝试令异教的诸王皈依，然而日耳曼多神教在维京人中间仍旧强悍。在遥远东南的巴格达，曾经强盛至西起西班牙东到波斯的阿巴斯王朝，最终沦丧于内乱，只剩下以往帝国统治的中心地带。而在北非海岸上，一支打着法蒂玛哈里发国旗号的新敌人出现了，正准备填补他们大敌留下的权力真空。

original: Consul: Though only honorary now, it denotes the wearer as an important servant of the Empire.
translation: 执政官：尽管现在仅为荣衔，其仍表示持有者是帝国的重要公仆。

original: Patrician: Recognizes the wearer as an elite member of Roman Society and is reserved for only the most influential servants of the Empire.
translation: 贵人：确认持有者是罗马社会的精英成员，只有帝国最有影响力的公仆能有幸获得。

original: Venerable one: Only important members of the imperial family and those related to them by marriage or blood may bear this venerable title.
translation: 可敬者：只有皇室中的重要成员或与他们有姻亲血缘关系的人才可持有这个令人尊敬的头衔。

original: Most Pious Augusta: Unlike the male counterpart the Augusta continues to be the most important woman of the empire. Wielding great power and authority, she is second only to the Basileus.
translation: 最虔诚的奥古斯塔：与对应的男性尊号不同，奥古斯塔仍然是帝国最重要的女性。她掌握着万人之上的权力与权威，仅次于巴西琉斯一人之下。

original: The Qarmatians were a heterodox branch of Shi’a Islam that combined elements of Zoroastrianism. They rejected the mainstream succession of the Shi’ite rulers, and instead established a theocratic republic in eastern Arabia in the 10th Century. They are remembered for their brutal sacking of Mecca and rejection of the Hajj pilgrimage.
translation: 卡尔马特派是伊斯兰教什叶派的一个异端分支，融合了一些祆教元素。他们拒绝承认什叶派统治者的主流传承，转而在十世纪的阿拉伯半岛东部建立了一个神权共和国。由于他们对麦加的残酷掠夺以及拒绝朝觐而被人们铭记。

original: Famed and respected as the ruler who pushed the vikings out of the British Isles, and the first King of England.
translation: 由于他把维京人驱逐出不列颠群岛，并作为英格兰的第一位国王而声名显赫、备受尊敬。

original: Known for combining the two separate parts of Burgundy to form the new Kingdom of Arles.
translation: 以将勃艮第的两个独立部分结合起来形成新的阿尔勒王国而闻名。

original: During the tumultuous years of the Abbasid caliphate, the Fatimids rose up in Ifriqiya and established their own Caliphate under [This.GetFullName].
translation: 在阿拔斯王朝陷入动荡不安的时候，法蒂玛王朝在伊非里吉亚崛起并在[This.GetFullName]领导下建立了属于自己的哈里发国。

original: Conquered Italy, regained the old lands of the Holy Roman Empire and raised its banners once more.
translation: 他征服了意大利，夺回了神圣罗马帝国的故土，并又一次扬起了帝国的旗帜。

original: He is famed for conquering Bahrein and establishing the Qarmatian Republic. They would go on to haunt their neighbors for many years to come.
translation: 他因征服巴林以及建立卡尔马特共和国而闻名于世。在未来的岁月里，他们会不断地侵扰他们的邻邦。

original: He was the last Zoroastrian ruler who fought back against the Muslims in Persia, trying to reestablish the Sasanian Empire
translation: 他是波斯境内最后一位抗击穆斯林的祆教统治者，试图重建萨珊帝国

original: My brother Mardavij tried to repel the Muslim faith and restore the Sasanian Empire in Persia. Though he failed, maybe it is time for me to pick up his legacy and reestablish the empire myself?
translation: 我的兄弟马尔达维季试图在波斯境内驱逐伊斯兰信仰并恢复萨珊帝国。虽然他失败了，但也许是时候由我来继承他的遗志并重建帝国？

original: Though I am respected as the ruler of Kiev, I often have a certain distance to some of my courtiers and vassals. Maybe it is time for me to adopt their culture and faith?
translation: 虽然我是受尊敬的基辅统治者，但我和我的某些廷臣和附庸们一直保持着一段距离。也许是时候接受他们的文化和信仰了？

original: Our realm stretches far beyond the capabilities and strength of normal kingdoms. It is time for our realm to be known as the Empire of [e_bulgaria.GetName].
translation: 我们疆域远超普通王国的能力和实力。是时候改国号为[e_bulgaria.GetName]帝国。

original: It is time to establish a new capital for our Caliphate in the bountiful delta of Lower [k_egypt.GetName].
translation: 是时候在下[k_egypt.GetName]资源丰富的三角洲为我们的哈里发国建立新的首都了。

original: We know just the location where we could raise a new castle, in the province of [c_aargau.GetName]. It will be the pride of our family, and we will name ourselves after it and be known as the von Habsburg dynasty.
translation: 我们知晓在[c_aargau.GetName]省份内正好有一处地方能建立新的城堡。其将成为我们家族的骄傲，我们将以之命名，改姓冯·哈布斯堡家族。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! and [Root.GetHerHis] close relatives will become members of the §Yvon Habsburg§! family.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!与[Root.GetHerHis]近亲将成为§Y冯·哈布斯堡§!家族的成员。

original: Otto was crowned King of the Germans after the death of his father Henry I. Early in his reign he had to push back a rebellion by Duke Eberhard of Bavaria, as well as fight a war against Louis IV of West-Francia and Duke Gilbert of Lorraine. After securing peace in the war, Otto went on to fight for the Italian throne as well as push back the Hungarian threat in the east. In his later years, after his coronation as the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire, he had to continue his struggles in Italy to keep his newfound empire under control. The Ottonian dynasty went on to control the empire for almost half a century after his death, until it finally ended with the demise of Henry II in 1024.
translation: 奥托在其父亨利一世死后加冕为日耳曼人的国王。在统治早期，他不得不击退巴伐利亚公爵埃伯哈德的叛乱，并与西法兰克的路易四世和洛林公爵吉尔伯特开战。结束战争达成和平后，奥托继而为意大利王位而战，并击退东方匈牙利人的威胁。在他加冕为神圣罗马帝国皇帝后的晚年，他还必须继续在意大利斗争，以保证新建立的帝国能得到控制。奥托王朝在他驾崩后继续控制帝国几乎半个世纪，直到亨利二世于1024年驾崩。

original: Al-Qaim followed his father, Caliph al-Mahdi, as he settled down in Ifriqiya and established the Fatimid Caliphate. In direct opposition to the Abbasid Caliphate in Baghdad, they filled the room left behind as the Abbasids had lost control of their peripheral regions. Early in al-Qaim's reign, a large rebellion rose up in the west led by Abu Yazid. For several years the Fatimid armies were pushed back, as the rebellion grew ever closer to their capital in Mahdia. After al-Qaim's death, his son and successor al-Mansur finally managed to beat the rebellion back and take control of their lands once again. The dynasty would later go on to invade Ikhshidid Egypt and establish Cairo as the new capital of their Caliphate.
translation: 哈里发马赫迪定居伊非里吉亚并建立法蒂玛哈里发国，其子卡伊姆追随父亲的道路。他们与巴格达的阿拔斯哈里发国直接对抗，填补了阿拔斯王朝对边疆地区失去控制后留下的真空。在卡伊姆统治的早期，西部出现了阿布·雅兹德领导的大规模叛乱。法蒂玛军队持续数年节节败退，而叛军逼近首都马赫迪亚。卡伊姆死后，其子兼继承人曼苏尔终于成功击退叛军，重新控制失去的土地。这一王朝之后将进而入侵伊赫昔迪王朝的埃及，并将开罗定为他们哈里发国的新首都。

original: As the son of Edward the Elder, he gained the Kingdom of Mercia after the death of his father, and Wessex after the death of his brother only weeks afterwards. Waging war against the Norsemen in York, Æthelstan pushed northwards and took the city in 927, becoming the first king of a truly united England. Ten years later, in 937, a coalition led by the Kings of Scotland, Strathclyde, and Dublin waged war against Æthelstan, which ended with the Battle of Brunanburh. With a decisive victory it seemed Æthelstan had finally secured his rule in England, but only two years later he died and was succeeded by his half-brother Edmund.
translation: 长者爱德华之子埃塞尔斯坦，在其父死后继承了麦西亚王国，又仅在数星期后因其弟去世而继承了威塞克斯王国。埃塞尔斯坦向约克的诺斯人开战，于927年拿下该城，成为首位真正统一英格兰的国王。十年后的937年，苏格兰、斯特拉斯克里德与都柏林三王共同向埃塞尔斯坦开战，并以埃塞尔斯坦赢得决定性的布鲁南博尔之战而告终。埃塞尔斯坦似乎终于确保了他在英格兰的统治，但他在仅仅两年后去世，由同父异母弟爱德蒙即位。
阿布 塔希尔 贾纳比

original: Abu'l-Qasim Sa'id started the Qarmatian faith centered around his capital in al-Bahrein when the Fatimid Caliphate rose in the west. After his father's demise, Abu Tahir continued as the new leader and became infamous throughout the Arabian Peninsula for his raids into Egyptian and Abbasid lands. In 930 he pillaged Mecca, murdered the many pilgrims who had travelled there and stole the Black Stone. After this sacrilege the Qarmatians became even more hated throughout the whole Muslim world, but that did not deter Abu Tahir as he continued the raids and assaults on his neighbours, until he finally died a decade later.
translation: 当法蒂玛哈里发国在西方崛起时，阿布·卡西姆·赛义德创立了以他在巴林的首都为中心的卡尔马特派信仰。阿布·塔希尔在其父死后继位为新任领导人，并因他劫掠埃及和阿拔斯两地而在阿拉伯半岛臭名昭著。他于930年洗劫麦加，杀死许多前来该处的朝圣者并盗走黑石。此次渎圣后卡尔马特派信徒更受整个穆斯林世界仇恨，但这未能阻止阿布·塔希尔，他继续劫掠和攻击其邻国，直到他于十年后去世。

original: As the third grand prince of the Hungarians and the successor to the legendary Árpád, Zolta led their people for several decades in the early 10th century. Throughout this period the Hungarians were feared raiders who travelled across all of Europe, from Byzantium to Córdoba. After his death in the year 950, only a few years passed until Otto I beat back the Hungarian raiders in the Battle of Lechfeld, putting an end to their tyranny.
translation: 佐尔陶作为匈牙利人的第三位大公和传奇般阿帕德的继承人，在10世纪早期领导他的人民数十年。在此期间，匈牙利人是令人惧怕的劫掠者，从拜占庭到科尔多瓦，他们的足迹遍布整个欧洲。在他于950年死后不过数年，奥托一世就在莱希费尔德之战中击退匈牙利劫掠军，终结了他们的暴政。

original: Hakon was one of the many many sons of Harald Fairhair, legendary king of Norway. When his brother Eirik took control of Norway, not many years passed until his despotic rule made him unpopular to the point of rebellion. Hakon who had been raised by King Æthelstan of England was sent back home to Norway to take over the rule of the kingdom. As a christian in a very pagan country, he had a long and tenuous rule over the many norwegian tribes. Throughout his rule he was threatened by the Danish king who supported the claims of his grandsons, the sons of his half-brother Eirik. In the end Hakon fell as he repelled the Danes at the Battle of Fitjar, and was succeeded by his nephew Harald II Greycloak.
translation: 哈孔是传说中的挪威国王金发哈拉尔德的诸多儿子之一。其兄埃里克掌控挪威后未过多少年，他的专制统治就令他不受欢迎并引发叛乱。由英格兰国王埃塞尔斯坦养大的哈孔被送回家乡挪威以接管此王国的统治权。作为原始宗教国家中的基督徒，他对许多挪威部落维持着长久而脆弱的统治。他在整个统治期间都受到丹麦国王的威胁，丹麦国王支持他的孙子和他同父异母兄埃里克诸子的宣称。最终，哈孔在驱除丹麦人的菲恰尔之战中战死，并由侄子灰衣哈拉尔德二世继位。

original: These garrisons are commonplace in [sardinian.GetName] lands, with the most elite of troops ready to protect the region.
translation: 这些卫戍营地在[sardinian.GetName]的地界上随处可见，最精锐的部队居住其中，随时待命以保卫这片土地。

original: §YThankmar§! will become the new king of the §YKingdom of Germany§!
translation: §Y坦克玛尔§!将会成为§Y德意志王国§!的新国王

original: The various story events surrounding 'The Iron Century' bookmark will be enabled.
translation: 开启有关「铁之世纪」剧本的诸多剧情事件。

original: The various story events surrounding 'The Iron Century' bookmark will be disabled.
translation: 关闭有关「铁之世纪」剧本的诸多剧情事件。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is the heir to a famous bloodline.
Has the bloodline of a §Y[shiite.GetName]§! leader.
Has the bloodline of a §Y[qarmatian.GetName]§! leader.
Either independent or all lieges publicly follow the §Y[shiite.GetName]§! religion\n
translation: 要么独立，要么所有封君都公开信仰§Y[shiite.GetName]§!\n

original: Either independent or all lieges publicly follow the §Y[sunni.GetName]§! religion\n
translation: 要么独立，要么所有封君都公开信仰§Y[sunni.GetName]§!\n

original: No ongoing revolt to create the §YShia Caliphate§!
translation: 没有爆发拥立§Y什叶派哈里发§!的叛乱
持有一个王国头衔，且此头衔并非§Y[k_bulgaria.GetName]§!

original: The traitorous Duke Giselbert of Lorraine left our service after the death of our esteemed father King Henry. Now they have turned to the protection of the Karlings in West Francia, asking them for aid against us.\n\nNot only have they forsaken their ancient service to our rule, but our spies tells us Gilbert has been conspiring with traitorous lords of the realm. The insult is too much to bear at this point, and it is about time we took back what is rightfully ours.
translation: 我们敬爱的父亲亨利国王死后，洛林公爵，卖国贼吉塞尔伯特抛弃了我们的誓约。他现在转而向西法兰克的加洛林家族寻求庇护，请求他们帮忙对付我们。\n\n我们的密探得知，吉塞尔伯特不仅抛弃了与我们统治的古老誓约，他还一直以来在和王国内怀有叛心的诸侯通信密谋。欺辱其甚，是可忍，孰不可忍？现在是时候收回我们应得的东西了。

original: Lorraine is not to be held by the Karlings nor their vassals.
translation: 洛林不能被加洛林或他的封臣控制。

original: We will honor our part of the pact.
translation: 我们将履行我们在停战协议中的义务。

original: Giselbert and Lorraine will be left alone.
translation: 吉塞尔伯特和洛林问题将会被搁置。

original: Reports from our scouts in the east confirms our suspicions, Otto is preparing for an attack on our lands. Long has the king of the Germans sought for a justifiable reason to try and force Lorraine back under his sovereignty, but now it seems he has thrown caution to the wind.\n\nIt is time to gather our men and protect ourselves. Lorraine is ours, and we will make sure the Germans pay dearly for every step they take into it.
translation: 我们在东部的侦察兵证实了我们的猜想，奥托正准备突袭我们的领地。长久以来，德意志人的国王都在为迫使洛林回到他的统治之下寻找一个合情合理的借口，但现在看来，他已经将谨慎抛诸脑后了。\n\n现在是时候集结起我们的部队来保护自己了。洛林是我们不容分割的领土，我们将让德意志人的每一步都付出惨重的代价。

original: They will not pass into our lands unopposed.
translation: 在我们的国土上，他们绝不会畅通无阻。

original: My younger brother Otto has been a thorn in my side from a young age, and it only escalated after he was made primary heir to our father Heinrich. He has repeatedly withheld titles that should be rightfully mine, and given them away to others instead.\n\nFrom my correspondence with the other lords of the realm, it is clear I am not the only one who feels slighted by my tyrannical sibling. Particularly the lords of Franconia and East Frisia are sure to join me, if I am to make a declaration of war upon Otto.
translation: 从小时候起，我的弟弟奥托就是我的肉中刺，而在他成为我们父亲海因里希的主要继承人后，这刺愈加痛苦。他一再扣留本应属于我的头衔，并将它们转封予他人。\n\n在与国内其他领主的书信往来中，我明显感受到，我绝不是唯一一个受到我那专横跋扈的兄弟轻视的人。倘若我向奥托宣战，尤其是法兰克尼亚与东法兰克的诸侯们肯定会加入我的行列。

original: Time to take my rightful place as the heir of Heinrich.
translation: 是时候拿回作为海因里希继承人的我应得的东西了。

original: I do not have the men or followers for such a war.
translation: 我没有部队或追随者来打这场战争。

original: The elder bastard of Heinrich, Thankmar, have declared war upon our liege, his younger brother Otto. It has been obvious to most that the man has felt slighted by his sibling for quite a while now, and it comes as no surprise when one of his messengers arrive in [Root.Capital.GetName].\n\nAfter a long and tiring speech, the messenger finally asks if we can bring word back to his lord that we will join the rebellion. Though we have never particularly cared for Otto either, it all seems a bit much. Though it is a good chance to lessen the authority of the Saxon Kings.
translation: 海因里希的私生长子坦克玛尔向我们的封君，他的弟弟奥托，开战了。显而易见，这个人长久以来都感到被他的弟弟所怠慢，因此他的信使来到[Root.Capital.GetName]向我们求助也是意料之中。\n\n在冗长乏味的游说辞令结束后，信使终于问我们要不要向他的主人传话说我们将加入叛乱。虽然我们也从没怎么特别关心过奥托，但这一切似乎有点过分了。不过，这或许是削弱萨克森人国王权威的绝好机会？

original: Yes, bring back word we will march upon Otto immediately.
translation: 好，你去回话，我们马上就向奥托的方向进军。

original: No, we have no interest in your petty little war.
translation: 不，我们对你可怜的小战争毫无兴趣。

original:
It seems my beloved older brother Thankmar has raised an army to topple my rule over the Germans. Though a surprise to everyone at court, the man has always had an ambitious streak.

After a couple of minutes to process all of it, I give the order to prepare our troops to fight our fellow Saxons. It is a tragedy that it has come to this, but it seems like there is no other choice.

Let us just hope there will not be more lords flocking to his cause.
translation:
看来我亲爱的兄长坦克玛尔已经召集起一支军队来推翻我对德意志人的统治。尽管宫廷诸臣都震惊于这个消息，但他的野心一直以来都有迹可寻。

在一小会的骚动之后，我下令让我的部队做好准备去和我的萨克森同胞作战。事情到此地步无疑是一场悲剧，但也许我们别无选择。

我们祈祷不会有更多的领主涌入他的旗下。

original: After a long and tiresome war, our victory has finally been ensured, as Otto is brought to me in chains. He looks tired and saddened by all of it, but I will not let him spoil the celebrations.\n\nThe lords now look to me for guidance, as the new king of the Germans. Lately, however, I have felt like it might be time to put an end to the Saxon rule over foreign lands. Maybe it is time to return to time of old, before the Carolingians and Merohingians gathered all the Germans under one rule.
translation: 在一场漫长而乏味的战争之后，我们终于胜利收入囊中，奥托被铐上了枷锁带到我的面前。他经历的一切让他看起来疲惫而悲伤，但我不会让他妨碍我的庆祝。\n\n作为德意志人的新王，诸侯们正企盼着我的指示。然而，如今我觉得是时候结束萨克森人对外族土地的统治了。也许是时候回到过去的时代了，回到墨洛温和加洛林将所有德意志人统合之前。

original: I will continue my father's legacy.
It is time to return to the old ways.

The greater dukes of the realm will be granted independence, and the §YKingdom of Germany§! will be shattered into:
* §YKingdom of Saxony§!
* §YKingdom of Thuringia§!
* §YKingdom of Franconia§!
* §YKingdom of Swabia§!

The §YHoly Roman Empire§! will be turned into a defunct title which can no longer be obtained.
translation:
领土内较大的公爵将会获得独立，头衔§Y德意志王国§!将被摧毁，并分化为以下头衔：
* §Y萨克森王国§!
* §Y图林根王国§!
* §Y法兰克尼亚王国§!
* §Y施瓦本王国§!

头衔§Y神圣罗马帝国§!将会被标记为失效，并无法再创建。

original: A Return to the Old Ways

After crushing the armies of his brother Otto, King Thankmar of the Germans has declared that the tribes of old will once more be ruled by their own. No longer will a Saxon King rule over foreign people.

Unmaking the centuries of authority built up by the Carolingians, Merohingians and even those of his own family, he has simply let go off the old bonds binding the dukes of the southern lands to himself.

Franconia, Swabia, Thuringia and Bavaria now look to their own lords to rule them in these uncertain times. It is said the legacy of Charlemagne has been buried for good.
translation:
在彻底击溃兄弟奥托的军队之后，德意志国王坦克玛尔宣布：古老的部族将再次由他们自己统治，萨克森人国王将不再统治外族人民。

他毁灭了墨洛温、加洛林乃至他自己的王朝先王数百年所建立的权威，轻率地摆脱了南方诸侯的古老羁绊。

法兰克尼亚、施瓦本、图林根和巴伐利亚现在只能指望他们自己的领主在这个动荡的时代统治他们了。由此观之，查理大帝的遗产已经被永远地埋葬了。

original:
I look at Thankmar, as he is brought to me in chains. My once great older brother looks haggard and tired as he stands in front of me. I finally ask the guards to take him away, for now.

No celebrations will be had, as this has been nothing but a tragedy for all of us. Though it was an appalling end, it was most likely the only conclusion we could have to this conflict.

With the problematic lords of the realm quelled, it is time to look towards the future.
translation:
我注视着身戴镣铐的坦克玛尔被带到我面前。我曾经伟岸的长兄看上去憔悴而疲惫，我最终让卫兵暂时将他带走。

没有任何的庆祝，因为对我们所有人来说，这都是一个悲剧。尽管这是一个令人惊骇的结局，但在这场冲突之中，这很可能是我们唯一能给出的答案。

随着领地内制造麻烦的领主都被镇压，是时候展望未来了。

original: There is still a lot to be done.

Under the horrendous leadership of [italian_king.GetTitledFirstName], Italy has become a shadow of what it once was. The great legacy of the Romans and their descendants have been shattered by the civil wars and the chaos of the last decades.\n\nNow many of the minor Italian lords under his leadership have sent us emissaries asking for aid. They supposedly miss the days when they were under our distant rule. If we want to raise the banners of Charlemagne once more, the Kingdom of Italy will be essential in securing our recognition as true descendants of his empire.
translation: 在[italian_king.GetTitledFirstName]的暴虐统治下，意大利早已不复从前的辉煌。罗马人及其后继者伟大的遗产已经在过去百十年的内战与混乱中破坏殆尽。\n\n现在，在他的暴政下，许多意大利的小领主派使者来向我们求援。他们应该怀念在我们遥远的统治之下的日子。如果我们想要再次高扬起查理大帝的旗帜，也许意大利王国是确保我们受承认为其帝国正统继承者所必须的一块拼图。

original: Prepare our men, Italy will be secured for the good of all.
translation: 集结部队，拿下意大利是为所有人的利益着想。

original: We have no interest in this region, leave them to their petty infighting.
translation: 我们对该地区不感兴趣，让他们自己内讧去吧。

original: The King of the Germans to our north, Otto, have declared war upon us. He loudly claim it is for the best of the Italian people, and pretends that he is liberating Italy from the rule of [italian_king.GetTitledName].\n\nThe Germans are preparing to pass through the Alps, and put an end to the chaos that has embroiled Italy once and for all. Who will stand against them and treat them like invaders, and who will embrace them like old neighbors and friends?
translation: 我们北边德意志人的国王奥托向我们宣战了。他大声地宣称他是为意大利人民的利益着想，并装成正将意大利从[italian_king.GetTitledName]手中解放出来的样子。\n\n德意志人正准备翻越阿尔卑斯山，彻底结束意大利所遭受的混乱局面。谁会以友邻之礼招待拥抱他们，又有谁会视他们为侵略者，奋起而反击他们呢？

original: As the King of the Germans and with the Kingdom of Italy in our hands, few dispute our potential claim to Charlemagne's fame and empire. All that is missing, is our official proclamation of such a thing. Our advisors and friends are looking for us to give the word. Our chamberlain has hinted that he is ready to prepare a coronation any day now.\n\nIs it time to truly grasp our long-awaited fate? Will we raise the banners of Charlemagne once more, and declare ourselves the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire?
translation: 作为德意志的国王，意大利王国现在掌控在我们手中，现在鲜有人能否认我们满足了如查理大帝般的声望与国力。现在唯一欠缺的，就是我们正式地作出宣告。我们的顾问与亲友正请求我发布声明，大臣们也进谏暗示他们已做好准备随时进行加冕典礼。\n\n如今是把握我们期待已久的命运好时机吗？我们是否能够再次高举查理大帝的旗帜，并宣告自己是神圣罗马帝国的皇帝？
查理曼的遗产现在是我们的了。

original: We are not quite ready yet.

In a beautiful ceremony in [From.Capital.GetName], Otto has invited friends, allies and enemies from near and far to take part as he is crowned the Emperor of the West. After quelling the lords who tried to oppose him early in his rule, and taking back the lands of his father piece by piece, few are left to oppose the king at this point.\n\nWith the banners of Charlemagne raised once more, and the authority of the long-lost empire at his back, Otto has done what nobody expected of him when he started his tumultuous rule. Now what is he planning to do next?
translation: 在于[From.Capital.GetName]举行的宏大典礼上，奥托延请他的亲朋、盟友与敌人参加他加冕为西方皇帝的仪式。在其统治初期，他镇压了那些试图反对他的领主，并一块一块地夺回了属于他父亲的土地，而到目前为止，鲜有人胆敢反对这位国王了。\n\n随着查理大帝的旗帜被重新升起，长期被遗落的帝国权威被重新树立，奥托做到了在他动荡不安的统治之处无人预料到的成就。那么接下来他又将剑指何方呢？

original: The Shias under the rule of [sultan_egypt.GetTitledName] have long suffered from being treated different to their Sunni neighbors, and lately it has gotten even worse. Stories of families being run out of or murdered in their homes have been told back to us, and now they are looking for someone to help them out.\n\nSeveral messengers, traders and merchants have come to [Root.Capital.GetName] to seek our aid, begging us to intervene. Egypt has long been an area that we have wished to influence, and this could be an opportunity to do just that.
translation: 长久以来，[sultan_egypt.GetTitledName]治下的什叶派信徒被与他们的逊尼派邻居区别对待，近来，这种情况变得更糟。我们已经有所耳闻，某些家族被放逐，有些人在家里被杀害。现在他们正在寻找一个能帮助他们的人。\n\n几名信使、贸易者与商人已经来到[Root.Capital.GetName]寻求我们的帮助，乞求我们出面。长久以来，我们就一直希望在埃及扩展我们的影响，这正是一个大好的机会。

original: Sadly, we do not have the resources to help them.
translation: 抱歉，我们心有余而力不足。

original: The name 'West-Frisia' is a relic of times past, when the Frisians had presence in these lands. With them driven out and replaced by mighty Dutch, people have begun calling our realm 'Holland' instead, after the forested lands that form the center of the duchy. Perhaps it is time for us to embrace the change and use the new name in our records?
translation: 「西弗里西亚」是过去生活在这片土地上的弗里斯兰人的称呼遗留。随着他们被驱逐，取而代之的是强大的荷兰人，因为公爵领中心多树的土地，人们开始将我们的领地称呼为「荷兰」（意为森林之地）。也许是时候让我们接受这个变化，在我们的公文中使用新的名称了？
好。时代在发展，社会在进步！

original: No, we must honor our legacy.
translation: 不，我们必须尊重我们先人的遗产。

original: The lands north of the Rhine delta were once ruled by a mighty Frisian kingdom, but with their presence a distant memory, 'Holland' has become the accepted term for their duchy. [From.GetBestName] has encouraged the transition, and will be using it in [From.GetHerHis] official records from this moment forward.
translation: 莱茵三角洲北部的土地曾经被弗里斯兰人强大的王国所统治，但随着他们的存在已成为一个遥远的记忆，「荷兰」成为他们公国的公认名称。[From.GetBestName]正鼓励着这种叫法，并从此在[From.GetHerHis]官方文书中使用这个名称。

original: A newer, mightier culture rules Holland now!
translation: 一个更新，更高贵的文化现在是荷兰的主人！

original: A weed by any other name...
translation: 不管叫什么，都不过是些杂草……

original: After the failed revolt of [From.GetBestName] has finally been put down, [geldern_holder.GetTitledName] has brought forward a petition to your court to be installed as the ruler of Hamaland in the traitor's stead. [geldern_holder.GetSheHeCap], a claimant to Hamaland, seems a skilled and trustworthy fellow, and would no doubt be an asset to the realm.
translation: 在[From.GetBestName]的叛乱被挫败平定之后，[geldern_holder.GetTitledName]向你的宫廷上书请愿，请求任命他替代从前的叛贼来治理哈马兰。作为哈马兰的宣称者，[geldern_holder.GetSheHeCap]似乎老练而可靠，毫无疑问将成为我们国家最宝贵的财富。

original: For that low baron? I think not.
translation: 为那个小小的男爵？我不那么想。

original: After the failed rebellion of [FromFrom.GetBestName], a baron from Geldern has won the favor of [From.GetBestName], and [geldern_holder.GetSheHe] has been elevated to higher nobility. [geldern_holder.GetSheHeCap] now rules in the land formerly known as Chamavia.
translation: 在[FromFrom.GetBestName]的叛乱被挫败平定之后,一位来自格尔德恩的男爵兑现了[From.GetBestName]的人情，这一举动使[geldern_holder.GetSheHe]被加封为更高等级的爵位，现在[geldern_holder.GetSheHeCap]统治着一片叫查玛维亚的领地。

original: That traitor! Those are my lands!
translation: 那个叛徒！那是我的领地！

original: A representative of the newly expanded city of Breda is making demands of you. They want their status as the main population center of the county of Toxandria to be recognized. The Toxandri were a tribe as mighty as any other, but the people have been extinct for centuries. Perhaps it is time to do away with this relic of a name, and honor Breda instead?
translation: 新建的布雷达市的一名代表向你提出了请求。他们希望自己作为托山德里亚郡的人流中心地位得到承认。托山德里亚作为一个部落曾经与其他部落一样强大，但他们早已经灭亡数个世纪了。也许是时候抛弃这个陈旧的名字，转而采用「布雷达」的新称呼了？

original: If it will appease the city, it could bring diplomatic benefits.
translation: 如果这能安抚这个城市，那也能带来外交上的好处。

original: No, we must honor our legacy.
translation: 不，我们必须尊重我们先人的遗产。

original: [From.GetBestName] has elected to refer to [From.GetHerHis] county of Toxandria by the name of its most populous city, Breda, from this moment onwards. The burghers are much pleased by the recognition and have held a feast in the honor of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
A weed by any other name...
translation: 不管叫什么，都不过是些杂草······

original: This ruler respects the third estate, and has won their favor.
translation: 统治者尊重第三阶层，并赢取了他们的好感。

original: A representative of the newly expanded city of Kleve is making demands of you. They want their status as the main population center of the county of Hattuaria to be recognized. The Chattuarii were a tribe as mighty as any other, but the people have been extinct for centuries. Perhaps it is time to do away with this relic of a name, and honor Kleve instead?
If it will appease the city, it could bring diplomatic benefits.
translation: 如果这能安抚这个城市，那也能带来外交上的好处。

original: No, we must honor our legacy.
translation: 不，我们必须尊重我们先人的遗产。

original: [From.GetBestName] has elected to refer to [From.GetHerHis] county of Hattuaria by the name of its most populous city, Kleve, from this moment onwards. The burghers are much pleased by the recognition and have held a feast in the honor of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
A weed by any other name...
translation: 不管叫什么，都不过是些杂草······
